sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_ec02f500db61ab006bb976740f9619ce
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>u_expanded_stakeholder_register</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Validate Unique</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {
	var group = current.u_group;
	var portfolio = current.u_portfolio;
	var program  = current.u_program;
	var product = current.u_product;

	if (gs.nil(group) || (gs.nil(portfolio) && gs.nil(program) && gs.nil(product))) {
		gs.addErrorMessage(gs.getMessage('Must have a Group and at least one of Portfolio, Program or Product.'));
		current.setAbortAction(true);
	} else {
		var duplicateCheck = new GlideRecord('u_expanded_stakeholder_register');

		duplicateCheck.addQuery('u_group', group);
		duplicateCheck.addQuery('sys_id', '!=', current.sys_id);
		if (!gs.nil(portfolio)) duplicateCheck.addQuery('u_portfolio', portfolio);
		if (!gs.nil(program)) duplicateCheck.addQuery('u_program', program);
		if (!gs.nil(product)) duplicateCheck.addQuery('u_product', product);
	
		duplicateCheck.query();
	
		// Abort if the query returned a result.
		if (duplicateCheck.hasNext()) {
			gs.addErrorMessage(gs.getMessage('Group and Portfolio/Program/Product combination already exists'));
			current.setAbortAction(true);
		}
	}

})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>Keith.Tucker@hhs.gov</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-10-29 16:32:25</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>ec02f500db61ab006bb976740f9619ce</sys_id><sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Validate Unique</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_ec02f500db61ab006bb976740f9619ce</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>Keith.Tucker@hhs.gov</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-11-07 19:22:09</sys_updated_on><template/><when>before</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=ec02f500db61ab006bb976740f9619ce"/></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: wf_activity_definition_12953fa6db61a3406373748e0f96193d
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="wf_activity_definition"><wf_activity_definition action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><action>false</action><attributes>generate=approval,approval=true</attributes><base_provider/><category>Approvals</category><default_height/><default_width/><description>The Approval - Group Multiple activity creates a group approval record or set of group approval records. The activity generates approval records for each member of the group. As opposed to user approvals, ServiceNow tracks group approvals at the group level. Group approvals let you see which groups approve or reject the request along with the users responsible for the group level approval.

The approvals made by each group are preserved in this variation of the workflow activity. The vendor-supplied activity definition overwrites the group approvals with the overall approval.

Use this activity to request approvals from users within a group.

The activity state tells the workflow engine how to handle the record being executed. Possible state values are:
*Executing: the workflow engine starts the 'run' function of the activity.
*Waiting: the workflow engine ignores the activity until a specific event to restart the activity is fired. 
*Finished: the activity finished running. See the result value for the outcome of the activity.
*Cancelled: this activity or the workflow that contains this activity was canceled.
*Error: a JavaScript error occurred. Review the logs for error details.

You can assign a result value using 'activity.result' from within a script field of the activity. By default, the result value is the final approval disposition. This disposition depends on the actions take by the approvers and the conditions specified in the 'Wait for' and 'When Anyone Rejects' fields. Possible result values are: 
*Approved
*Rejected
*Skipped
*Deleted
*Cancelled
 
Keep in mind: 
*This activity contains script fields. Do not use the 'current.update()' method in these script fields because it may cause recursive updates to the current record.
*If the approval group assigned in the 'Groups' field can not be resolved, the default result of the approval is Skipped and will result in the Approved transition.</description><image>images/heisenberg_icons/workflow/approval_group.png</image><js_class_name>Approval___Group_Multiple</js_class_name><name>Approval - Group Multiple</name><script><![CDATA[/**
 * Group approvals are tracked by the group but requested from all group members
 */

var Approval___Group_MultipleActivityHandler = Class.create();
Approval___Group_MultipleActivityHandler.prototype = Object.extendsObject(WFActivityHandler, {
   
   initialize: function() {
      WFActivityHandler.prototype.initialize.call(this);
      this.approvalUtils = new WorkflowApprovalUtils();
      this.setDatesFlag = false;
   },
   
   onExecute: function() {
      /**
       * Create the approvals and (optionally) wait for them to either be approved or rejected.
       */
      
      // did we pre-generate the approvals?
      var approvals;
      var state;
	  var groupMap = [];
      var genObj = this._getGenerateObj(activity.activity.toString());
      if (genObj && genObj.approvals) {
         approvals = genObj.approvals;
		 groupMap = genObj.groupMap;
         if (approvals.length > 0) {
            // In order to maintain the approval state if we revisit this approval activity
            // we need to only request those approvals that are currently in a Not Requested state
			 
			 state = this.approvalUtils.getGroupApprovalStateById(approvals);
			 if(state && state != 'not requested') {
				 this.approvalUtils.setGroupApprovalsByIds(approvals, 'not_required', '', ['not requested']);
				 activity.state = state;
                 activity.result = state;	 
			 } else
				 this.approvalUtils.setGroupApprovalsByIds(approvals, 'requested', '', ['not requested']);
         }
      } else {
         // if we are a child of an Approval Manager activity, then we
         // create the approvals in a Not Requested state and let the AM
         // remove any duplicates before setting the approvals to Requested
         if (activity.activity.parent.nil())
            state = 'requested';
         else
            state = 'not requested';
         
         this._setDueDate("");
         approvals = this._createApprovals(state);
		 groupMap = this.approvalUtils.getUserApprovalIdsForGroups(approvals);
      }
      this._removeGenerateObj(activity.activity.toString());
      
      // any approvals?
      if (approvals.length == 0)
         activity.result = 'skipped';
      else
         activity.state = 'waiting';
      
      // save the list of group approval ids
	  for (var idx in groupMap)
		  activity.scratchpad[idx] = groupMap[idx];
      activity.scratchpad.approval_ids = approvals;

      // If we are maintaining approval states (from the previous execution of the workflow),
      // then we need to determine our current state unless we are a child activity, in which
      // case we will be asked to determine our state after our parent has removed any duplicates
      if ((approvals.length > 0) && (workflow.scratchpad.maintainStateFlag == true) && activity.activity.parent.nil())
         this._onUpdate();
   },

   // override this to provide the proper stage state
   getFinalStageState: function() {
	   return new WFApprovalStages().getApprovalState(current, current.stage, activity);
   },

   onDetermineApprovalState: function() {
      this.forceState = true;
      this._onUpdate();
   },
   
   // The task has changed, see if we need to update our approval state
   onUpdate: function() {
      this._onUpdate();
   },
   
   _onUpdate: function() {
      var state = this._determineOverallState();
      if (GlideStringUtil.notNil(state) && (state != 'requested')) {
         this.approvalUtils.setPendingGroupApprovalsByIds(activity.scratchpad.approval_ids, 'not_required');
         activity.state = 'finished';
         activity.result = state;
      } else if ((state == 'requested') && (activity.result != state)) {
         // changed back to requested state (unapprove can do this)
         activity.state = 'waiting';
         activity.result = '';
      } else if ((GlideStringUtil.nil(state)) && (GlideStringUtil.nil(activity.result))) {
         // deleting the Group approval with cascade delete to approvals can do this
         activity.state = 'finished';
         activity.result = 'skipped';
      }
   },
   
   // The approval was cancelled
   onCancel: function() {
      this.approvalUtils.setPendingGroupApprovalsByIds(activity.scratchpad.approval_ids, 'cancelled');
	  this.approvalUtils.setPendingUserApprovalsByGroup(activity.scratchpad.approval_ids, 'cancelled');
      activity.state = 'cancelled';
      activity.result = 'cancelled';
   },
   
   /**
    * Create the approvals as a forward-looking process in which we just create, but do not
    * process the approvals.  This allows the approvals to be generated up front before the
    * workflow runs such that the approvals are visible prior to being requested.
    */
   _generate: function(approvalOrder, startAt, noCreateFlag) {
      this.approvalUtils = new WorkflowApprovalUtils();
      var genObj = {};
      this._setDueDate(startAt);
      this.setDatesFlag = true;
      if (!noCreateFlag) {
         genObj.approvals = this._createApprovals('not requested', approvalOrder);
		 genObj.groupMap = this.approvalUtils.getUserApprovalIdsForGroups(genObj.approvals);
	  }
      genObj.duration = this.duration;
      return genObj;
   },
   
   // Create the approval(s) based on the variables that are specified
   _createApprovals: function(state, approvalOrder) {
      this.existingIds = this._getExistingApprovals();
      var groupIds = this._getGroupIds();
      var approvalIds = this._buildApprovals(groupIds, state, approvalOrder);
      this._checkDroppedApprovals(approvalIds);
      return approvalIds;
   },
   
   _getExistingApprovals: function() {
      var ids = {};
      gr = new GlideRecord('sysapproval_group');
      gr.initialize();
      gr.addQuery('parent', current.sys_id);
      gr.addQuery('wf_activity', activity.activity.sys_id);
      gr.addQuery('approval', '!=', 'cancelled');
      gr.query();
      while (gr.next())
         ids[gr.assignment_group.toString()] = gr.sys_id.toString();
      
      return ids;
   },
   
   _getGroupIds: function() {
      // does the condition match?
      if (!this._isConditionMatch())
         return [];
      
      var groups = {};
      
      // groups
      this.approvalUtils.addIdsToApprovalList(groups, activity.vars.groups + '');
      
      // additional approvers script
      if (activity.vars.advanced && activity.vars.approver_script) {
      	try {
        	var ids = this.runScript(activity.vars.approver_script);
	        if (ids) {
	           if (typeof(ids) == 'string') {
	              ids = ids.split(','); 
	           }
	           this.approvalUtils.addIdsToApprovalList(groups, ids);
	        }
         } catch (ex) {
         	if (JSUtil.isEmpty(groups)) {
         		//no other approver and the advanced script failed = fault
         		throw 'No Approval Group selected and advanced script encountered an error:'+ ex.message;
         	} else {
         		//at least one approver came from the other fields in the activity, log the error but no fault
            	workflow.error('advanced script encountered an error:' + ex.message);
            }
         }
      }
      
      return groups;
   },
   
   _buildApprovals: function(groupIds, state, approvalOrder) {
      var approvalIds = [];
      for (var id in groupIds) {
         var approvalId = this._createApproval(id, state, approvalOrder);
         if (approvalId)
            approvalIds.push(approvalId);
      }
	   
      return approvalIds;
   },
   
   /**
    * Create a new group approval or update an existing group approval
    */
   _createApproval: function(groupId, state, approvalOrder) {
      var approvalId;
      if (this.existingIds && this.existingIds[groupId]) {
         approvalId = this.existingIds[groupId];
         this._setApprovalState(approvalId, state);
      } else
      approvalId = this._createNewApproval(groupId, state, approvalOrder);
      
      return approvalId;
   },
   
   _createNewApproval: function(groupId, state, approvalOrder) {
      // make sure there are users of the group before creating it
      var ids = this.approvalUtils.getMembersOfGroup(groupId);
      if (ids.length == 0)
         return "";
      
      var approval = new GlideRecord('sysapproval_group');
      approval.assignment_group = groupId;
      approval.parent = current.sys_id;
	  approval.parent.setRefRecord(current);
      approval.wf_activity = activity.activity.sys_id;
      approval.approval = state;
      if (approvalOrder)
         approval.order = approvalOrder;
      
      approval.expected_start.setValue(this.expected_start);
      approval.due_date.setValue(this.due_date);
      return approval.insert();
   },
   
   _setDueDate: function(startAt) {
      this.expected_start = new GlideDateTime();
      if (startAt)
         this.expected_start.setValue(startAt);
      
      var wd = new WorkflowDuration();
      wd.setActivity(this);
      wd.setStartDateTime(startAt);
      wd.setWorkflow(context.schedule, context.timezone);
      wd.calculate(activity.vars.__var_record__);
      this.due_date = new GlideDateTime(wd.getEndDateTime());
      this.duration = wd.getTotalSeconds() * 1000;
   },
   
   /**
    * Set the state of the approval to the specified state
    */
   _setApprovalState: function(approvalId, state) {
      if (workflow.scratchpad.maintainStateFlag == true)
         return;
      
      var approval = new GlideRecord('sysapproval_group');
      if (!approval.get(approvalId))
         return;
      
      approval.approval = state;
      if (this.setDatesFlag) {
         approval.expected_start.setValue(this.expected_start);
         approval.due_date.setValue(this.due_date);
      }
      approval.update();
   },
   
   /**
    * Delete any approvals that we previously created but did not match during
    * this creation pass
    */
   _checkDroppedApprovals: function(approvalIds) {
      if (!this.existingIds)
         return;
      
      var prevIds = {};
	   var id;
      for (id in this.existingIds)
         prevIds[this.existingIds[id]] = true;
      
      for (var i = 0; i < approvalIds.length; i++)
         prevIds[approvalIds[i]] = false;
      
      var dropIds = [];
      for (id in prevIds) {
         if (prevIds[id])
            dropIds.push(id);
      }
      
      if (dropIds.length > 0) {
         var gr = new GlideRecord('sysapproval_group');
         gr.addQuery('sys_id', dropIds);
         gr.query();
         while (gr.next()) {
            this.approvalUtils.addApprovalHistoryGR(current, gs.getMessage("Group approval for {0} deleted since it no longer matches approval rule {1}.", [gr.assignment_group.name.toString(), activity.activity.name.toString()]));
            gr.deleteRecord();
         }
      }
   },
   
   _isConditionMatch: function() {
      if (!activity.vars.condition.toString())
         return true;
      
      return GlideFilter.checkRecord(current, activity.vars.condition);
   },
   
   // Determine the overall state of the approvals (approved, rejected or '')
   _determineOverallState: function() {
      var groupApprovals, ret;
      var ids = activity.scratchpad.approval_ids;
      if (!ids)
         return 'skipped';
      
      var waitFor = activity.vars.wait_for;
      if (waitFor == 'script') {
         if (!activity.vars.approval_script)
            return 'approved';
         
         // Set up information to be passed to the script
         //    overall counts
         ret = this.approvalUtils.getGroupIdListApprovalCounts(ids);
         ret.counts['total'] -= ret.counts['not_required'];
         ret.counts['total'] -= ret.counts['duplicate'];
         ret.counts['total'] -= ret.counts['cancelled'];
         workflow.prepareScriptVariable('counts', ret.counts);
         workflow.prepareScriptVariable('approvalIDs', ret.approvalIDs);
         
         //    group level counts and user ids
         var groups = {};
		 var groupRet = {};
         for (var i = 0; i < ids.length; i++) {
            var id = ids[i];
			 
			// Jakarta: 
			// We now track the approvals in the scratchpad for better 
			// detection of duplicate user approvals that were deleted
			if (GlideStringUtil.notNil(activity.scratchpad[id]) && typeof activity.scratchpad[id] !== "undefined")
				groupRet = this.approvalUtils.getGroupUserApprovalCounts(activity.scratchpad[id]);
			else
				groupRet = this.approvalUtils.getUserGroupApprovalCounts(id);
			 
            groups[id] = {};
            groups[id].approvalIDs = groupRet.approvalIDs;
            for (var s in groupRet.counts)
               groups[id][s] = groupRet.counts[s];
         } 
         
         workflow.prepareScriptVariable('groups', groups);
         var newState = this.runScript(activity.vars.approval_script);
         workflow.removeScriptVariable('groups');
         workflow.removeScriptVariable('approvalIDs');
         workflow.removeScriptVariable('counts');
		  
		 // If the newState is not requested then it has changed to Approved, Rejected, Cancelled
		 // or a custom state so mark any remaining Group approvals to No Longer Required
		 if (newState && GlideStringUtil.notNil(newState) && (newState != 'requested')) {
			 groupApprovals = new GlideRecord('sysapproval_group');
			 groupApprovals.addQuery('sys_id', ids);
			 groupApprovals.query();
			 while (groupApprovals.next()) {
				 //The vendor-supplied version performs the line below to overwrite all group approvals with the overall state.
				 // This version preserves the group approval states.
//				 groupApprovals.approval = newState;
				 groupApprovals.setWorkflow(false);
				 groupApprovals.update();
				 this.approvalUtils.setPendingUserApprovalsByGroup(groupApprovals.sys_id, 'not_required');
			 }
		 }
		  
		 if (!newState || GlideStringUtil.nil(newState))
			 newState = 'requested';
		  
         return newState;
      }
      
      // check for approval state change within each group
      var rejectHandling = activity.vars.reject_handling;
      var changed = false;
      groupApprovals = new GlideRecord('sysapproval_group');
      groupApprovals.addQuery('sys_id', ids);
      groupApprovals.query();
      while (groupApprovals.next()) {
         if (this._determineGroupState(groupApprovals, waitFor, rejectHandling))
            changed = true;
      }
      
      if (!changed && !this.forceState)
         return '';
      
      // And then the overall state
      ret = this.approvalUtils.getGroupIdListApprovalCounts(ids);
      ret.counts['total'] -= ret.counts['not_required'];
      ret.counts['total'] -= ret.counts['duplicate'];
      ret.counts['total'] -= ret.counts['cancelled'];
      if (ret.counts['total'] == 0)
         return 'skipped';
      
      if ((ret.counts['rejected'] > 0) && (rejectHandling == 'reject'))
         return 'rejected';
      
      if ((waitFor == 'any' || waitFor == 'first_any') && (ret.counts['approved'] > 0))
         return 'approved';
      
      if ((waitFor == 'first_any') && (ret.counts['rejected'] > 0))
         return 'rejected';
      
      if ((waitFor == 'all' || waitFor == 'any_each' || waitFor == 'first_each') && (ret.counts['approved'] == ret.counts['total']))
         return 'approved';
      
      if ((ret.counts['rejected'] + ret.counts['approved']) == ret.counts['total']) {
         // we are complete - we have to make a decision
         return 'rejected';
      }
      
      return 'requested';
   },
   
   // Determine approval state for a group approval
   _determineGroupState: function(gr, waitFor, rejectHandling) {
      if (gr.admin_override == true)
         return true;		// force a determination of overall state since this might be the first change for admin override
      
      var currentState = gr.approval + '';
      var newState = "requested";
      var user;
      var mootPeers = false;
      var ret = {};
	
	  // Jakarta: 
	  // We now track the approvals in the scratchpad for better 
	  // detection of duplicate user approvals that were deleted
	  if (GlideStringUtil.notNil(activity.scratchpad[gr.sys_id]) && typeof activity.scratchpad[gr.sys_id] !== "undefined")
		  ret = this.approvalUtils.getGroupUserApprovalCounts(activity.scratchpad[gr.sys_id]);
	  else
		  ret = this.approvalUtils.getUserGroupApprovalCounts(gr.sys_id);
	   
      ret.counts['total'] -= ret.counts['not_required'];
      ret.counts['total'] -= ret.counts['cancelled'];
      if (ret.counts['total'] == 0) {
		  if (currentState == 'rejected')
			  newState = 'rejected';
		 else if (currentState == 'cancelled')
			  newState = 'cancelled';
		 else if (currentState == 'not_required')
			  newState = 'not_required';
         else
			 newState = 'approved';
		  
         mootPeers = true;
         
      } else if ((waitFor == 'first_any' || waitFor == 'first_each') && (ret.counts['rejected'] > 0)) {
         // first response with a rejection
         newState = 'rejected';
         user = ret.approvalIDs['rejected'][0];
         mootPeers = true;
         
      } else if ((waitFor == 'first_any' || waitFor == 'first_each') && (ret.counts['approved'] > 0)) {
         // first response with an approval
         newState = 'approved';
         user = ret.approvalIDs['approved'][0];
         mootPeers = true;
         
      } else if ((rejectHandling == 'reject') && (ret.counts['rejected'] > 0)) {
         // first reject and rejection handling is reject immed.
         newState = 'rejected';
         user = ret.approvalIDs['rejected'][0];
         mootPeers = true;
         
      } else if ((waitFor == 'any' || waitFor == 'any_each') && (ret.counts['approved'] > 0)) {
         // any approval and we have one
         newState = 'approved';
         user = ret.approvalIDs['approved'][0];
         mootPeers = true;
         
      } else if ((waitFor == 'all') && (ret.counts['approved'] == ret.counts['total'])) {
         // all approval and we have all
         newState = 'approved';
         mootPeers = true;
         
      } else if ((waitFor == 'any' || waitFor == 'any_each') && (ret.counts['rejected'] == ret.counts['total'])) {
         // any approval, but everyone has rejected
         newState = 'rejected';
         user = ret.approvalIDs['rejected'][0];
      }
      
      // If all approvals are 'not_required' and currentState is rejected, cancelled, not_required, or approve
	  // Then the group approval was either rejected, cancelled, not_required, or approved
      if (newState && (currentState != newState)) {
         gr.approval = newState;
         if (user)
            gr.approval_user = user;
         else if (newState == 'requested')
            gr.approval_user = "";
         
         this._setGroupApprovalComment(gr, currentState, newState, user);
         
         gr.update();
         return true;
      }
	  
	  // Check for the Approval coming from Group Approval record (sysapproval_group)
	  if (newState && (currentState == newState))
		  return true;
	   
      return false;
   },
   
   _setGroupApprovalComment: function(gr, currentState, newState, user) {
      var groupName = gr.assignment_group.name.toString();
      var userName = this.approvalUtils.getUserName(user);
      var comment;
      if (newState == 'requested')
         comment = gs.getMessage("Group approval for {0} reset to requested due to user approval change from {1} to requested ({2}).", [groupName, currentState, activity.activity.name.toString()]);
      
      else if (newState == 'approved') {
         if (user)
            comment = gs.getMessage("Group approval for {0} approved by user {1} ({2}).", [groupName, userName, activity.activity.name.toString()]);
         else
            comment = gs.getMessage("Group approval for {0} approved by all users ({1}).", [groupName, activity.activity.name.toString()]);
      }
      
      else if (newState == 'rejected') {
         if (user)
            comment = gs.getMessage("Group approval for {0} rejected by user {1} ({2}).", [groupName, userName, activity.activity.name.toString()]);
         else
            comment = gs.getMessage("Group approval for {0} rejected by all users ({1}).", [groupName, activity.activity.name.toString()]);
      }
      
      if (comment)
         this.approvalUtils.addApprovalHistoryGR(current, comment);
   },
	
   type: 'Approval___Group_MultipleActivityHandler'

16:18:214a9fc1d7db29a3406bb976740f96192e1Keith.Tucker@hhs.gov2018-11-08 16:24:12// Set the variable 'answer' to a comma-separated list of group ids or an array of group ids to add as approvers. // // For example: // var answer = []; // answer.push('id1'); // answer.push('id2'); var answer = []; function impacted(demand, grStakeholder, metric) { var approvalNeeded = false; var grGroupMember = new GlideRecord('sys_user_grmember'); grGroupMember.addQuery('group', grStakeholder.getValue('u_group')); grGroupMember.query(); while (grGroupMember.next()) { // Find the assessment instance for the assessor on the passed demand. // Make sure to retrieve the specific instance for the assessment stakeholder stored in related_id_1. var grAssessmentInstance = new GlideRecord('asmt_assessment_instance'); grAssessmentInstance.addQuery('trigger_id', demand) .addCondition('related_id_1', grStakeholder.getUniqueValue()) .addCondition('user', grGroupMember.getValue('user')); grAssessmentInstance.setLimit(1); grAssessmentInstance.query(); if (grAssessmentInstance.next()) { // Look for an impact assessment result for the assessment instance. var grMetricResult = new GlideRecord('asmt_metric_result'); grMetricResult.addQuery('instance', grAssessmentInstance.getUniqueValue()) .addCondition('metric', metric); grMetricResult.setLimit(1); grMetricResult.query(); if (grMetricResult.next()) { if ((grMetricResult.getValue('actual_value') || '') == '1') { approvalNeeded = true; break; } } } } return approvalNeeded; } //Retrieve the list of approval stakeholders for the demand. var grApprovers = new GlideRecord('dmn_m2m_demand_stakeholder'); grApprovers.addQuery("demand", current.sys_id); grApprovers.query(); if (grApprovers.hasNext()) { while (grApprovers.next()) { var grStake = new GlideRecord('u_expanded_stakeholder_register'); grStake.get(grApprovers.getValue('u_expanded_stakeholder')); if (grStake.getValue('u_approver') == 'yes') { //Add the group to the approval group array. answer.push(grStake.getValue('u_group')); } } } // Loop over the list of impacted stakeholders for the demand. var impactedStakeholders = {}; var grImpactedStakeholders = new GlideRecord('u_multi_tenant_demand_stakeholder'); grImpactedStakeholders.addQuery('u_demand', current.sys_id); grImpactedStakeholders.query(); if (grImpactedStakeholders.hasNext()) { // Retrieve the record for the Impacts metric, to use in later queries. var grMetric = new GlideRecord('asmt_metric'); var encodedQuery = 'name=Impacts^category.name=Impact^category.metric_type.name=Multi-tenant Demand'; grMetric.addEncodedQuery(encodedQuery); grMetric.setLimit(1); grMetric.query(); if (grMetric.next()) { while (grImpactedStakeholders.next()) { //Create an array of groups to create, one for each //Portfolio/Program/Product combination. var grStake = new GlideRecord('u_expanded_stakeholder_register'); grStake.get(grImpactedStakeholders.getValue('u_expanded_stakeholder')); var portfolio = grStake.getValue('u_portfolio') || ''; var program = grStake.getValue('u_program') || ''; var product = grStake.getValue('u_product') || ''; var groupKey = portfolio + '/' + program + '/' + product; var approver = grStake.getValue('u_approver') == 'yes'; var assessor = grStake.getValue('u_assessment') == 'yes'; if (impactedStakeholders.hasOwnProperty(groupKey)) { workflow.debug(gs.getMessage('Updating stakeholder group {0}', groupKey)); // If this stakeholder is an approver, add it to the approvers array. if (approver) { workflow.debug(gs.getMessage('Adding approval group {0}', grStake.getValue('u_group'))); impactedStakeholders[groupKey].approvers .push(grStake.getValue('u_group')); } if (assessor) { // Check the assessment result for this stakeholder, and OR it with // any previous assessments to determine whether an approval is // needed from this group. impactedStakeholders[groupKey].approvalNeeded |= impacted(current.sys_id, grStake, grMetric.getUniqueValue()); } } else { workflow.debug(gs.getMessage('Adding stakeholder group {0}', groupKey)); // Initialize the fields for the group. impactedStakeholders[groupKey] = {}; if (approver) { workflow.debug(gs.getMessage('Adding approval group {0}', grStake.getValue('u_group'))); impactedStakeholders[groupKey].approvers = [grStake.getValue('u_group')]; } else { impactedStakeholders[groupKey].approvers = []; } if (assessor) { impactedStakeholders[groupKey].approvalNeeded = impacted(current.sys_id, grStake, grMetric.getUniqueValue()); } else { impactedStakeholders[groupKey].approvalNeeded = false; } } // End if groupKey exists in impactedStakeholders object } // End loop over impacted stakeholders } else { workflow.debug(gs.getMessage('Impact metric not found.')); }// End if metric found } // End if impacted stakeholders found if (Object.keys(impactedStakeholders).length > 0) { for (var g in impactedStakeholders) { workflow.debug(gs.getMessage('Checking approval need for {0}', [g])); if (impactedStakeholders[g].approvalNeeded) { //Add the groups for the group key to the array for which approvals will be requested. for (var i=0; i<impactedStakeholders[g].approvers.length; i++) { workflow.debug(gs.getMessage('Adding approval group {0}', [impactedStakeholders[g].approvers[i]])); answer.push(impactedStakeholders[g].approvers[i]); } } } } 16:18:21079533e6db61a3406373748e0f961965wf_activityce9fc1d7db29a3406bb976740f96192a1370sys_variable_valueKeith.Tucker@hhs.gov2018-11-08 16:18:21829fc1d7db29a3406bb976740f96192c0Keith.Tucker@hhs.gov2018-11-08 16:18:21// Set the variable 'answer' to '', 'approved' or 'rejected' to indicate the overall approval status for this approval. // // This script is responsible for setting the approval state for each group that is part of this approval activity before // returning the overall approval state for all of the group(s). // // When called, the following variables are available to the script: // // Overall for all of the groups that are part of this approval activity: // counts.total = total number of groups that are part of this approval // counts.approved = # of groups that approved so far // counts.rejected = # of groups that rejected so far // counts.requested = # of groups that are pending approval // counts.not_requested = # of groups that are not pending approval // counts.not_required = # of groups that approval is not required // // And for each group: // groups[group_id].total = total number of users that are part of this group's approval // groups[group_id].approved = # of users that approved so far // groups[group_id].rejected = # of users that rejected so far // groups[group_id].requested = # of users that are pending approval // groups[group_id].not_requested = # of users that are not pending approval // groups[group_id].not_required = # of users that approval is not required // // groups[group_id].approvalIDs[state] = array of user ids that are at the specified approval state // // Note: Iterate the groups using: // for (var id in groups) { // var group = groups[id]; // ... group.total ... // } // Assume all approvals aren't finished yet. var answer = ''; for(var id in groups) { var group = groups[id]; var groupApproval = new GlideRecord('sysapproval_group'); groupApproval.get(id); // Skip this group if it's already been decided. var approvalState = groupApproval.getValue('approval') || ''; if ((approvalState != 'approved') && (approvalState != 'rejected')) { // Set the group approval if any answer has been received. if(group.approved > 0) { //Mark the group approval record 'Approved' groupApproval.approval = 'approved'; counts.approved++; groupApproval.update(); } else if (group.rejected > 0) { groupApproval.approval = 'rejected'; counts.rejected++; groupApproval.update(); } } } // If all groups have rendered a decision, return the overall status for the approval task. // Otherwise, leave the overall status as empty so the group approval task will remain active. // Set it to 'approved' only if all groups approved. if(counts.approved == counts.total){ answer = 'approved'; } else if (counts.rejected == counts.total) { answer = 'rejected'; } else if ((counts.approved + counts.rejected) == counts.total) { answer = 'conflicted'; } aa95ffa6db61a3406373748e0f9619c8wf_activityce9fc1d7db29a3406bb976740f96192a100sys_variable_valueKeith.Tucker@hhs.gov2018-11-08 GlideRecord('sys_user_grmember'); grGroupMember.addQuery('group', grStakeholder.getValue('u_group')); grGroupMember.query(); while (grGroupMember.next()) { // Find the assessment instance for the assessor on the passed demand. // Make sure to retrieve the specific instance for the assessment stakeholder stored in related_id_1. var grAssessmentInstance = new GlideRecord('asmt_assessment_instance'); grAssessmentInstance.addQuery('trigger_id', demand) .addCondition('related_id_1', grStakeholder.getUniqueValue()) .addCondition('user', grGroupMember.getValue('user')); grAssessmentInstance.setLimit(1); grAssessmentInstance.query(); if (grAssessmentInstance.next()) { // Look for an impact assessment result for the assessment instance. var grMetricResult = new GlideRecord('asmt_metric_result'); grMetricResult.addQuery('instance', grAssessmentInstance.getUniqueValue()) .addCondition('metric', metric); grMetricResult.setLimit(1); grMetricResult.query(); if (grMetricResult.next()) { if ((grMetricResult.getValue('actual_value') || '') == '1') { approvalNeeded = true; break; } } } } return approvalNeeded; } //Retrieve the list of approval stakeholders for the demand. var grApprovers = new GlideRecord('dmn_m2m_demand_stakeholder'); grApprovers.addQuery("demand", current.sys_id); grApprovers.query(); if (grApprovers.hasNext()) { while (grApprovers.next()) { var grStake = new GlideRecord('u_expanded_stakeholder_register'); grStake.get(grApprovers.getValue('u_expanded_stakeholder')); if (grStake.getValue('u_approver') == 'yes') { //Add the group to the approval group array. answer.push(grStake.getValue('u_group')); } } } // Loop over the list of impacted stakeholders for the demand. var impactedStakeholders = {}; var grImpactedStakeholders = new GlideRecord('u_multi_tenant_demand_stakeholder'); grImpactedStakeholders.addQuery('u_demand', current.sys_id); grImpactedStakeholders.query(); if (grImpactedStakeholders.hasNext()) { // Retrieve the record for the Impacts metric, to use in later queries. var grMetric = new GlideRecord('asmt_metric'); var encodedQuery = 'name=Impacts^category.name=Impact^category.metric_type.name=Multi-tenant Demand'; grMetric.addEncodedQuery(encodedQuery); grMetric.setLimit(1); grMetric.query(); if (grMetric.next()) { while (grImpactedStakeholders.next()) { //Create an array of groups to create, one for each //Portfolio/Program/Product combination. var grStake = new GlideRecord('u_expanded_stakeholder_register'); grStake.get(grImpactedStakeholders.getValue('u_expanded_stakeholder')); var portfolio = grStake.getValue('u_portfolio') || ''; var program = grStake.getValue('u_program') || ''; var product = grStake.getValue('u_product') || ''; var groupKey = portfolio + '/' + program + '/' + product; var approver = grStake.getValue('u_approver') == 'yes'; var assessor = grStake.getValue('u_assessment') == 'yes'; if (impactedStakeholders.hasOwnProperty(groupKey)) { workflow.debug(gs.getMessage('Updating stakeholder group {0}', groupKey)); // If this stakeholder is an approver, add it to the approvers array. if (approver) { workflow.debug(gs.getMessage('Adding approval group {0}', grStake.getValue('u_group'))); impactedStakeholders[groupKey].approvers .push(grStake.getValue('u_group')); } if (assessor) { // Check the assessment result for this stakeholder, and OR it with // any previous assessments to determine whether an approval is // needed from this group. impactedStakeholders[groupKey].approvalNeeded |= impacted(current.sys_id, grStake, grMetric.getUniqueValue()); } } else { workflow.debug(gs.getMessage('Adding stakeholder group {0}', groupKey)); // Initialize the fields for the group. impactedStakeholders[groupKey] = {}; if (approver) { workflow.debug(gs.getMessage('Adding approval group {0}', grStake.getValue('u_group'))); impactedStakeholders[groupKey].approvers = [grStake.getValue('u_group')]; } else { impactedStakeholders[groupKey].approvers = []; } if (assessor) { impactedStakeholders[groupKey].approvalNeeded = impacted(current.sys_id, grStake, grMetric.getUniqueValue()); } else { impactedStakeholders[groupKey].approvalNeeded = false; } } // End if groupKey exists in impactedStakeholders object } // End loop over impacted stakeholders } else { workflow.debug(gs.getMessage('Impact metric not found.')); }// End if metric found } // End if impacted stakeholders found if (Object.keys(impactedStakeholders).length > 0) { for (var g in impactedStakeholders) { workflow.debug(gs.getMessage('Checking approval need for {0}', [g])); if (impactedStakeholders[g].approvalNeeded) { //Add the groups for the group key to the array for which approvals will be requested. for (var i=0; i<impactedStakeholders[g].approvers.length; i++) { workflow.debug(gs.getMessage('Adding approval group {0}', [impactedStakeholders[g].approvers[i]])); answer.push(impactedStakeholders[g].approvers[i]); } } } } 6e95ffa6db61a3406373748e0f9619bbce9fc1d7db29a3406bb976740f96192aactivity.result == 'approved' || activity.result == 'skipped'08a573e6db61a3406373748e0f96197dstandardfalsefalsefalsetrueApproved1Approval request was approvedfalseKeith.Tucker@hhs.gov2018-11-08 sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_c53580c6c3322100348dd02422d3aed8
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>dmn_stakeholder_register</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Validate</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[var user = current.user;
var portfolio = current.portfolio;
if (gs.nil(user) || gs.nil(portfolio)) {
	gs.addErrorMessage(gs.getMessage('User and Portfolio cannot be empty'));
	current.setAbortAction(true);
}

var user_portfolio = new GlideRecord('dmn_stakeholder_register');
user_portfolio.addQuery('user', user);
user_portfolio.addQuery('portfolio', portfolio);
user_portfolio.addQuery('sys_id', '!=', current.sys_id);
user_portfolio.query();

// Issue the query to the database to get all records
if (user_portfolio.next()) {
	gs.addErrorMessage(gs.getMessage('User and Portfolio combination already exists'));
	current.setAbortAction(true);
}
]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2014-08-28 23:30:29</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>c53580c6c3322100348dd02422d3aed8</sys_id><sys_mod_count>13</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Validate</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Demand Management" source="com.snc.demand_management">db6982ff6f390200d45331012e3ee4de</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_c53580c6c3322100348dd02422d3aed8</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>Keith.Tucker@hhs.gov</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-10-29 16:28:14</sys_updated_on><template/><when>before</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=c53580c6c3322100348dd02422d3aed8"/></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_dictionary_u_expanded_stakeholder_register_u_display_name
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update><sys_dictionary action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE" element="u_display_name" table="u_expanded_stakeholder_register"><active>true</active><array>false</array><array_denormalized>false</array_denormalized><attributes/><audit>false</audit><calculation><![CDATA[(function calculatedFieldValue(current) {

	// Set the field value to the user name followed by the portfolio, program or product.
	var displayName = '';
	if (!current.u_user.nil()) {
		displayName = current.u_user.getDisplayValue();
		
		if (!current.u_product.nil()) { 
			displayName += ' (' + current.u_product.getDisplayValue() + ')';
		} else {
			if (!current.u_program.nil()) {
				displayName += '(' + current.u_program.getDisplayValue() + ')';
			} else {
				if (!current.u_portfolio.nil()) displayName += '(' + current.u_portfolio.getDisplayValue() + ')';
			}
		}
	}
	return displayName;  // return the calculated value

})(current);]]></calculation><choice/><choice_field/><choice_table/><column_label>Display name</column_label><comments/><create_roles/><default_value/><defaultsort/><delete_roles/><dependent/><dependent_on_field/><display>false</display><dynamic_creation>false</dynamic_creation><dynamic_creation_script/><dynamic_default_value/><dynamic_ref_qual/><element>u_display_name</element><element_reference>false</element_reference><foreign_database/><function_definition/><function_field>false</function_field><internal_type sys_update_xml.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_properties"><sys_properties action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><choices/><description>Approval engine to use for the x_hhsa2_ajg6_itsm_incident table. Valid options are: 'approval_rules' to use Approval Rules, 'process_guide' to use Process Guides and 'off' to turn off the approval engines for the table (set to 'off' when using Workflow to manage approvals). Off is the default setting.</description><ignore_cache>false</ignore_cache><is_private>false</is_private><name>glide.approval_engine.x_hhsa2_ajg6_itsm_incident</name><read_roles/><suffix/><sys_class_name>sys_properties</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>Keith.Tucker@hhs.gov</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-10-30 14:55:52</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_id>8a66ea1cdbadeb006373748e0f9619f7</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>glide.approval_engine.x_hhsa2_ajg6_itsm_incident</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_properties_8a66ea1cdbadeb006373748e0f9619f7</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>Keith.Tucker@hhs.gov</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-10-30 14:55:52</sys_updated_on><type>string</type><value>off</value><write_roles/></sys_properties><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=8a66ea1cdbadeb006373748e0f9619f7"/></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_b949a5fedb99e7006373748e0f961988
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="DELETE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>false</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>false</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>dmn_demand</collection><condition>previous.state == 3 && current.state == -4</condition><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Request Impacted Approvals</name><order>120</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[//Generate approval requests for demand stakeholders.

var checkImpact = false;

// Retrieve the record for the Impacts metric, to use in later queries.
var grMetric = new GlideRecord('asmt_metric');
var encodedQuery = 'name=Impacts^category.name=Impact^category.metric_type.name=Multi-tenant Demand';
grMetric.addEncodedQuery(encodedQuery);
grMetric.setLimit(1);
grMetric.query();
if (grMetric.next()) {
	checkImpact = true;
}

// Loop over all the approver stakeholders.
var grApprover = new GlideRecord('dmn_m2m_demand_stakeholder');
encodedQuery = "demand=" + current.sys_id + "^stakeholder.approver=yes";
grApprover.addEncodedQuery(encodedQuery);
grApprover.query();
while (grApprover.next()) {
	//Create an approval request.
	var grStakeholder = grApprover.stakeholder.getRefRecord();
	var grApproval = new GlideRecord('sysapproval_approver');
	grApproval.initialize();
	grApproval.approver = grStakeholder.user;
	grApproval.setValue('state', 'requested');
	grApproval.sysapproval = current.sys_id;
	grApproval.insert();
}

if (checkImpact) {
	// Loop over all the impacted approver stakeholders, creating an approval request if needed.
	var grApprover = new GlideRecord('u_multi_tenant_demand_stakeholder');
	encodedQuery = "u_demand=" + current.sys_id + "^u_stakeholder.approver=yes";
	grApprover.addEncodedQuery(encodedQuery);
	grApprover.query();
	while (grApprover.next()) {
		// Initially assume an approval is needed.
		var impacted = true;
	
		// Loop over the set of stakeholders looking for the specific assessors for this approver stakeholder.
		encodedQuery = "u_demand=" + current.sys_id + "^u_stakeholder.assessment=yes";
		var fieldValue = grApprover.getValue('portfolio') || '';
		if (fieldValue.length > 0) encodedQuery += "^u_stakeholder.portfolio=" + fieldValue;
		fieldValue = grApprover.getValue('u_program') || '';
		if (fieldValue.length > 0) encodedQuery += "^u_stakeholder.u_program=" + fieldValue;
		fieldValue = grApprover.getValue('u_product') || '';
		if (fieldValue.length > 0) encodedQuery += "^u_stakeholder.u_product=" + fieldValue;
		var grAssessor = new GlideRecord('u_multi_tenant_demand_stakeholder');
		grAssessor.addEncodedQuery(encodedQuery);
		grAssessor.query();
		// Assume no impact. ORing all assessment results will set to true if any assessor claimed impact. 
		impacted = false;
		while (grAssessor.next()) {
			// Find the assessment instance for the assessor on this demand.
			var grAssessmentInstance = new GlideRecord('asmt_assessment_instance');
			grAssessmentInstance.addQuery('trigger_id', current.sys_id).addCondition('user',grAssessor.getValue(stakeholder.User));
			gs.debug(gs.getMessage('Querying assessment instances for {0}', grAssessmentInstance.getEncodedQuery()));
			grAssessmentInstance.setLimit(1);
			grAssessmentInstance.query();
			if (grAssessmentInstance.next()) {
				// Look for an impact assessment result for the assessment instance.
				var grMetricResult = new GlideRecord('asmt_metric_result');
				grMetricResult.addQuery('instance', grAssessmentInstance.getUniqueValue());
				grMetricResult.addCondition('metric', grMetric.getUniqueValue());
				grMetricResult.setLimit(1);
				grMetricResult.query();
				if (grMetricResult.next()) impacted |= ((grMetricResult.getValue('actual_value') || '') == '1');
			}
		}
	}

	//Create an approval request.
	var grStakeholder = grApprover.stakeholder.getRefRecord();
	var grApproval = new GlideRecord('sysapproval_approver');
	grApproval.initialize();
	grApproval.approver = grStakeholder.user;
	if (impacted) {
		grApproval.setValue('state', 'requested');
	} else {
		grApproval.setValue('state','not_required');
	}
	grApproval.sysapproval = current.sys_id;
	grApproval.insert();
}


	]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>Keith.Tucker@hhs.gov</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-10-25 18:37:53</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>b949a5fedb99e7006373748e0f961988</sys_id><sys_mod_count>14</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Request Impacted Approvals</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_b949a5fedb99e7006373748e0f961988</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>Keith.Tucker@hhs.gov</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-10-31 12:23:17</sys_updated_on><template/><when>after</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=b949a5fedb99e7006373748e0f961988"/></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>dmn_demand</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition table="dmn_demand">stateIN3,-4,5,10,8,9^EQ<item endquery="false" field="state" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="IN" or="false" value="3,-4,5,10,8,9"/><item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/></filter_condition><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Check Multi-tenant Assessments</name><order>120</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {

	// Use the AssessmentUtils.checkRecord on assessments for the Multi-tenant Demand metric type.
	var gr = new GlideRecord('asmt_metric_type');
	if (gr.get('name','Multi-tenant Demand')) {
		new AssessmentUtils().checkRecord(current, gr.getUniqueValue());
	}

})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>Keith.Tucker@hhs.gov</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-11-01 15:28:29</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path/><sys_id>67fff04ddba52f006bb976740f961983</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Check Multi-tenant Assessments</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_67fff04ddba52f006bb976740f961983</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>Keith.Tucker@hhs.gov</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-11-01 15:28:29</sys_updated_on><template/><when>after</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=67fff04ddba52f006bb976740f961983"/></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_e55103e4db64eb006373748e0f9619ae
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="DELETE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>false</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>dmn_demand</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition table="dmn_demand">portfolioVALCHANGES^portfolioISNOTEMPTY^NQu_productVALCHANGES^u_productISNOTEMPTY^NQprimary_programVALCHANGES^EQ<item endquery="false" field="portfolio" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="VALCHANGES" or="false" value=""/><item endquery="false" field="portfolio" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="ISNOTEMPTY" or="false" value=""/><item endquery="false" field="u_product" goto="false" newquery="true" operator="VALCHANGES" or="false" value=""/><item endquery="false" field="u_product" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="ISNOTEMPTY" or="false" value=""/><item endquery="false" field="primary_program" goto="false" newquery="true" operator="VALCHANGES" or="false" value=""/><item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/></filter_condition><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Populate Stakeholders based on Portfolio</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[// Delete all the auto populated stakeholders for the previous portfolio
function deleteStakeholders(level) {
	var m2mGR = "";
	var stakeHolderList = "";
	
	var gr = new GlideRecord('dmn_stakeholder_register');
	
	if (level == "portfolio")
		{
		if (!previous.portfolio.nil()) {
			gr.addQuery('portfolio', previous.portfolio);
			gs.addInfoMessage("deleted Portfolio: " + previous.portfolio.getDisplayValue());
		}
		else
			return;
	}
	else if (level == "program")
		{
		if (!previous.primary_program.nil()) {
			gr.addQuery('u_program', previous.primary_program);
			gs.addInfoMessage("deleted Program: " + previous.primary_program.getDisplayValue());
		}
		else
			return;
	}
	else if (level == "product")
		{
		if (!previous.u_product.nil()) {
			gr.addQuery('u_product', previous.u_product);
			gs.addInfoMessage("deleted Product: " + previous.u_product.getDisplayValue());
		}
		else
			return;
	}
	
	gr.query();
	
	if (gr.hasNext()) {
		m2mGR = new GlideRecord('dmn_m2m_demand_stakeholder');
		stakeHolderList = "";
		while(gr.next()) {
			stakeHolderList += gr.getUniqueValue();
			gs.addInfoMessage("auto = true " + gr.getDisplayValue('user'));
			stakeHolderList += ",";
		}
		m2mGR.addQuery('stakeholder', 'IN', stakeHolderList);
		m2mGR.addQuery('demand', current.sys_id);
		m2mGR.addQuery('auto', true);
		m2mGR.deleteMultiple();
	}
	
	gr = "";
	gr = new GlideRecord('dmn_stakeholder_register');
	
	if (level == "portfolio")
		gr.addQuery('portfolio', current.portfolio);
	else if (level == "program")
		gr.addQuery('u_program', current.primary_program);
	else if (level == "product")
		gr.addQuery('u_product', current.u_product);
	
	gr.query();
	
	if (gr.hasNext()) {
		m2mGR = "";
		stakeHolderList = "";
		m2mGR = new GlideRecord('dmn_m2m_demand_stakeholder');
		while(gr.next()) {
			stakeHolderList += gr.getUniqueValue();
			gs.addInfoMessage("no auto " + gr.getDisplayValue('user'));
			stakeHolderList += ",";
		}
		m2mGR.addQuery('stakeholder', 'IN', stakeHolderList);
		m2mGR.addQuery('demand', current.sys_id);
		m2mGR.deleteMultiple();
	}
}

function addStakeholders(level) {
	// Add new stakeholders for the current portfolio
	var gr = new GlideRecord('dmn_stakeholder_register');
	
	if (level == "portfolio") {
		gr.addQuery('portfolio', current.portfolio);
		gs.addInfoMessage("added Portfolio: " + current.portfolio.getDisplayValue());
	}
	else if (level == "program") {
		gr.addQuery('u_program', current.primary_program);
		gs.addInfoMessage("added Program: " + current.primary_program.getDisplayValue());
	}
	else if (level == "product") {
		gr.addQuery('u_product', current.u_product);
		gs.addInfoMessage("added Product: " + current.u_product.getDisplayValue());
	}
	
	gr.query();
	while(gr.next()) {
		var m2mGR = new GlideRecord('dmn_m2m_demand_stakeholder');
		m2mGR.initialize();
		m2mGR.demand = current.sys_id;
		gs.addInfoMessage("adding " + gr.getDisplayValue('user'));
		m2mGR.stakeholder = gr.getUniqueValue();
		m2mGR.auto = true;
		m2mGR.insert();
	}
}

deleteStakeholders('portfolio');
deleteStakeholders('program');
deleteStakeholders('product');


if (!previous.portfolio.nil() && current.primary_program.nil() && current.u_product.nil()) 
	addStakeholders('portfolio');
else if (!previous.primary_program.nil() && current.u_product.nil()) {
	addStakeholders('program');
}
else if (!current.primary_program.nil() && current.u_product.nil()) {
	addStakeholders('program');
}
else if (!current.u_product.nil()) 
	addStakeholders('product');
else if (!current.portfolio.nil() && current.primary_program.nil())
		addStakeholders('portfolio');





]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>Michael.Ocasio@hhs.gov</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-09-11 18:29:13</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>e55103e4db64eb006373748e0f9619ae</sys_id><sys_mod_count>110</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Populate Stakeholders based on Portfolio</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_e55103e4db64eb006373748e0f9619ae</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>Keith.Tucker@hhs.gov</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-10-19 20:33:57</sys_updated_on><template/><when>after</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=e55103e4db64eb006373748e0f9619ae"/></record_update>

Valid options are: 'approval_rules' to use Approval Rules, 'process_guide' to use Process Guides and 'off' to turn off the approval engines for the table (set to 'off' when using Workflow to manage approvals). Off is the default setting.</description><ignore_cache>false</ignore_cache><is_private>false</is_private><name>glide.approval_engine.u_tracked_task</name><read_roles/><suffix/><sys_class_name>sys_properties</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>Keith.Tucker@hhs.gov</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-10-30 14:55:50</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_id>7566ea1cdbadeb006373748e0f961943</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>glide.approval_engine.u_tracked_task</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_properties_7566ea1cdbadeb006373748e0f961943</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>Keith.Tucker@hhs.gov</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-10-30 14:55:50</sys_updated_on><type>string</type><value>off</value><write_roles/></sys_properties><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=7566ea1cdbadeb006373748e0f961943"/></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_97a3df83db9de7006bb976740f9619db
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>false</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>dmn_demand</collection><condition>previous.state == 2 && current.state == 3</condition><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Create Impact Assessment</name><order>110</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {
	// Retrieve the sys_id of the multi-tenant metric type.
	var grMetricType = new GlideRecord('asmt_metric_type');
	if (grMetricType.get('name','Multi-tenant Demand')) {
		gs.debug(gs.getMessage('Retrieved Multi-tenant Demand metric type.'));
		//Retrieve the stakeholder groups to use for impact assessments.
		var gr = new GlideRecord('u_multi_tenant_demand_stakeholder');
		var encodedQuery = "u_demand=" + current.sys_id + "^u_expanded_stakeholder.u_assessment=yes";
		gr.addEncodedQuery(encodedQuery);
		gr.query();
		while (gr.next()) {
			var grStake = new GlideRecord('u_expanded_stakeholder_register');
			if (grStake.get(gr.getValue('u_expanded_stakeholder'))) {
				var grGroup = new GlideRecord('sys_user_group');
				if (grGroup.get(grStake.getValue('u_group'))) {
					//Collect the list of members in the group.
					var grGroupMember = new GlideRecord('sys_user_grmember');
					grGroupMember.addQuery('group',grGroup.getUniqueValue());
					grGroupMember.query();
					var ids = '';
					while (grGroupMember.next()) {
						if (!JSUtil.nil(ids))
							ids += ",";
						ids += grGroupMember.getValue('user');
					}
					if (!JSUtil.nil(ids)) {
						//Create assessments for all the members of the group.
						gs.debug(gs.getMessage('Creating assessments for demand {0}, user IDs {1}', [current.sys_id, ids]));
						var assessDetails = (new SNC.AssessmentCreation()).createAssessments(grMetricType.getUniqueValue(), current.sys_id, ids);
						var assessmentGroupId = assessDetails.split(',')[2];
						if (assessmentGroupId) {
							var asmtInstances = new GlideRecord('asmt_assessment_instance');
							asmtInstances.addQuery('assessment_group', assessmentGroupId);
							asmtInstances.query();		
							asmtInstances.setValue('trigger_id', current.sys_id);
							asmtInstances.setValue('trigger_table', current.sys_class_name);
							//Set the assessment instances to have a reference to the stakeholder record for context.
							asmtInstances.setValue('related_table_1', grStake.getValue('sys_class_name'));
							asmtInstances.setValue('related_id_1', grStake.getUniqueValue());
							asmtInstances.setWorkflow(false);
							asmtInstances.updateMultiple();
						} else {
							gs.warn('Unable to fetch assessment group details, demand assessment trigger details are not set');
							gs.debug(gs.getMessage('createAssessments returned {0}', assessDetails));
						}	
					} else {
						gs.debug(gs.getMessage('No assessment stakeholders found for demand {0} group {1}', [current.sys_id, grGroup.getDisplayValue()]));
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
})(current, previous);
]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>Keith.Tucker@hhs.gov</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-10-26 21:01:14</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>97a3df83db9de7006bb976740f9619db</sys_id><sys_mod_count>21</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Create Impact Assessment</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_97a3df83db9de7006bb976740f9619db</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>Keith.Tucker@hhs.gov</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-11-08 14:32:23</sys_updated_on><template/><when>after</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=97a3df83db9de7006bb976740f9619db"/></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_575b7958dba86b006bb976740f961900
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>false</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>dmn_stakeholder_register</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Validate</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[var user = current.user;
var portfolio = current.portfolio;
var program  = current.u_program;
var product = current.u_product;

if (gs.nil(user) || (gs.nil(portfolio) && gs.nil(program) && gs.nil(product))) {
	gs.addErrorMessage(gs.getMessage('Must have a User and at least one of Portfolio, Program or Product.'));
	current.setAbortAction(true);
} else {
	var duplicateCheck = new GlideRecord('dmn_stakeholder_register');

	duplicateCheck.addQuery('user', user);
	duplicateCheck.addQuery('sys_id', '!=', current.sys_id);
	if (!gs.nil(portfolio)) duplicateCheck.addQuery('portfolio', portfolio);
	if (!gs.nil(program)) duplicateCheck.addQuery('u_program', program);
	if (!gs.nil(product)) duplicateCheck.addQuery('u_product', product);
	
	duplicateCheck.query();
	
	// Abort if the query returned a result.
	if (duplicateCheck.hasNext()) {
		gs.addErrorMessage(gs.getMessage('User and Portfolio/Program/Product combination already exists'));
		current.setAbortAction(true);
	}
}
]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>Michael.Ocasio@hhs.gov</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-09-10 18:45:01</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>575b7958dba86b006bb976740f961900</sys_id><sys_mod_count>19</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Validate</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_575b7958dba86b006bb976740f961900</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>Keith.Tucker@hhs.gov</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-10-29 16:27:58</sys_updated_on><template/><when>before</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=575b7958dba86b006bb976740f961900"/></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>dmn_demand</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>true</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Auto business rule for Assessments</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[function onAfter(current, previous) { 
    var gr = new GlideRecord('dmn_demand');
    gr.addQuery('sys_id', current.sys_id);
    gr.addEncodedQuery('stateIN3,5,8,9^EQ');
    gr.query();
    if (gr.getRowCount() > 0) {
       new global.AssessmentUtils().checkRecord(current, '49fb8f4fdb5de7006bb976740f9619a8');
    }
}]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>Keith.Tucker@hhs.gov</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-10-26 20:30:19</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>da9c4b4fdb5de7006bb976740f961979</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Auto business rule for Assessments</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_da9c4b4fdb5de7006bb976740f961979</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>Keith.Tucker@hhs.gov</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-10-31 19:57:36</sys_updated_on><template/><when>after</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=da9c4b4fdb5de7006bb976740f961979"/></record_update>
