sys_update_xml.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_properties"><sys_properties action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><choices/><description>Approval engine to use for the pm_program_task table. Valid options are: 'approval_rules' to use Approval Rules, 'process_guide' to use Process Guides and 'off' to turn off the approval engines for the table (set to 'off' when using Workflow to manage approvals). Off is the default setting.</description><ignore_cache>false</ignore_cache><is_private>false</is_private><name>glide.approval_engine.pm_program_task</name><read_roles/><suffix/><sys_class_name>sys_properties</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>Keith.Tucker@hhs.gov</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-10-30 14:55:40</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_id>13566a1cdbadeb006373748e0f9619c8</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>glide.approval_engine.pm_program_task</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_properties_13566a1cdbadeb006373748e0f9619c8</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>Keith.Tucker@hhs.gov</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-10-30 14:55:40</sys_updated_on><type>string</type><value>off</value><write_roles/></sys_properties><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=13566a1cdbadeb006373748e0f9619c8"/></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_38b24ffcdb51a3006bb976740f96197c
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>dmn_demand</collection><condition>gs.hasRole('demand_manager') && (current.state ==1 || current.state == 2)</condition><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition table="dmn_demand">portfolioVALCHANGES^portfolioISNOTEMPTY^NQu_productVALCHANGES^u_productISNOTEMPTY^NQprimary_programVALCHANGES^primary_programISNOTEMPTY^EQ<item endquery="false" field="portfolio" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="VALCHANGES" or="false" value=""/><item endquery="false" field="portfolio" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="ISNOTEMPTY" or="false" value=""/><item endquery="false" field="u_product" goto="false" newquery="true" operator="VALCHANGES" or="false" value=""/><item endquery="false" field="u_product" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="ISNOTEMPTY" or="false" value=""/><item endquery="false" field="primary_program" goto="false" newquery="true" operator="VALCHANGES" or="false" value=""/><item endquery="false" field="primary_program" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="ISNOTEMPTY" or="false" value=""/><item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/></filter_condition><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Populate Demand Stakeholders</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous) {
	
	function deleteDemandStakeholders(stakeholderList, demand, autoAdded) {
		// Delete the list of stakeholders from the demand.
		if (stakeholderList.length > 0) {
			gs.debug(gs.getMessage('Deleting stakeholders {0} from demand {1}', [stakeholderList, demand]));
			var m2mGR;
			m2mGR = new GlideRecord('dmn_m2m_demand_stakeholder');
			m2mGR.addQuery('u_expanded_stakeholder', 'IN', stakeholderList);
			m2mGR.addQuery('demand', demand);
			// If autoAdded is true, add the condition to only delete the stakeholders that were automatically added.
			if (autoAdded) m2mGR.addQuery('auto', true);
			m2mGR.deleteMultiple();
		}
	}

	function deleteImpactedDemandStakeholders(stakeholderList, demand, autoAdded) {
		// Delete the list of impacted stakeholders from the demand.
		if (stakeholderList.length > 0) {
			gs.debug(gs.getMessage('Deleting impacted stakeholders {0} from demand {1}', [stakeholderList, demand]));
			var m2mGR;
			m2mGR = new GlideRecord('u_multi_tenant_demand_stakeholder');
			m2mGR.addQuery('u_expanded_stakeholder', 'IN', stakeholderList);
			m2mGR.addQuery('u_demand', demand);
			// If autoAdded is true, add the condition to only delete the stakeholders that were automatically added.
			if (autoAdded) m2mGR.addQuery('u_auto_added', true);
			m2mGR.deleteMultiple();
		}
	}
	
	function deletePortfolioStakeholders(current, previous) {
		// Delete all the auto populated stakeholders for the previous portfolio
		var m2mGR, stakeholderList;
		var gr = new GlideRecord('u_expanded_stakeholder_register');
		gr.addQuery('u_portfolio', previous.portfolio);
		gr.addNullQuery('u_program');
		gr.query();
		
		if (gr.hasNext()) {
			stakeholderList = '';
			while(gr.next()) {
				stakeholderList += gr.getUniqueValue();
				stakeholderList += ',';
			}
			deleteDemandStakeholders(stakeholderList, current.sys_id, true);
		}
			
		//Delete any stakeholders associated with the new portfolio, whether auto-populated or not,
		// so they won't be added twice when the Add function is called.
		gr = new GlideRecord('u_expanded_stakeholder_register');
		gr.addQuery('u_portfolio', current.portfolio);
		gr.addNullQuery('u_program');
		gr.query();
		if (gr.hasNext()) {
			stakeholderList = "";
			while(gr.next()) {
				stakeholderList += gr.getUniqueValue();
				stakeholderList += ",";
			}
			deleteDemandStakeholders(stakeholderList, current.sys_id, false);
		}
	}
			
	// Add new stakeholders for the current portfolio
	function addPortfolioStakeholders(current) {
		var gr = new GlideRecord('u_expanded_stakeholder_register');
		gr.addQuery('u_portfolio', current.portfolio);
		gr.addNullQuery('u_program');
		gr.query();
		while(gr.next()) {
			gs.debug(gs.getMessage('Adding portfolio stakeholder {0} to demand {1}', [gr.getDisplayValue(), current.sys_id]));
			var m2mGR = new GlideRecord('dmn_m2m_demand_stakeholder');
			m2mGR.initialize();
			m2mGR.demand = current.sys_id;
			m2mGR.u_expanded_stakeholder = gr.getUniqueValue();
			m2mGR.auto = true;
			m2mGR.insert();
		}
	}
				
	function deleteProgramStakeholders(current, previous) {
		// Delete all the auto populated stakeholders for the previous program
		var m2mGR, stakeholderList;
		var gr = new GlideRecord('u_expanded_stakeholder_register');
		gr.addQuery('u_program', previous.primary_program);
		gr.query();
		
		if (gr.hasNext()) {
			stakeholderList = "";
			while(gr.next()) {
				stakeholderList += gr.getUniqueValue();
				stakeholderList += ",";
			}
			deleteDemandStakeholders(stakeholderList, current.sys_id, true);
		}
						
		// Delete any stakeholders associated with the new program, so they won't be added twice when
		// the Add function is called.
		gr = new GlideRecord('u_expanded_stakeholder_register');
		gr.addQuery('u_program', current.primary_program);
		gr.query();
		if (gr.hasNext()) {
			m2mGR = new GlideRecord('dmn_m2m_demand_stakeholder');
			stakeholderList = "";
			while(gr.next()) {
				stakeholderList += gr.getUniqueValue();
				stakeholderList += ",";
			}
			deleteDemandStakeholders(stakeholderList, current.sys_id, false);
		}
	}
						
	// Add new stakeholders for the current program.
	function addProgramStakeholders(current) {
		var gr = new GlideRecord('u_expanded_stakeholder_register');
		gr.addQuery('u_program', current.primary_program);
		gr.query();
		while(gr.next()) {
			gs.debug(gs.getMessage('Adding program stakeholder {0} to demand {1}', [gr.getDisplayValue(), current.sys_id]));
			var m2mGR = new GlideRecord('dmn_m2m_demand_stakeholder');
			m2mGR.initialize();
			m2mGR.demand = current.sys_id;
			m2mGR.u_expanded_stakeholder = gr.getUniqueValue();
			m2mGR.auto = true;
			m2mGR.insert();
		}
	}
	
	function collectProductStakeholders(product, impacted) {
		var grStake = new GlideRecord('u_expanded_stakeholder_register');
		var stakeholderList = '';
		var productList = '';
		
		if (impacted) {
			// Collect the list of other products using the same platform as the passed product.
			var grAppPlat;
			var grApp = new GlideRecord('cmdb_application_product_model');
			grApp.addQuery('sys_id', product);
			grApp.query();
			if (grApp.hasNext()) {
				grApp.next();
				grAppPlat = new GlideRecord('cmdb_application_product_model');
				grAppPlat.addQuery('u_platform_product_model', grApp.getValue('u_platform_product_model')).addCondition('sys_id','!=',product);
				grAppPlat.query();
				productList = '';
				while (grAppPlat.next()) {
					productList += grAppPlat.getUniqueValue() + ',';
				}
				//Add the platform itself.
				productList += grApp.getValue('u_platform_product_model');
				//Collect the stakeholders for the list of products found.
				grStake.addQuery('u_product', 'IN', productList);
				gs.debug(gs.getMessage('Collecting stakeholders for product list {0}', productList));
			} else {
				// No matching application model found, so check whether the passed product is a platform model.
				var grPlat = new GlideRecord('u_cmdb_platform_product_model');
				grPlat.addQuery('sys_id', product);
				grPlat.query();
				if (grPlat.hasNext()) {
					grAppPlat = new GlideRecord('cmdb_application_product_model');
					grAppPlat.addQuery('u_platform_product_model', grApp.getValue('u_platform_product_model'));
					grAppPlat.query();
					productList = '';
					while (grAppPlat.next()) {
						productList += grAppPlat.getUniqueValue() + ',';
					}
					//Collect the stakeholders for the list of products found.
					grStake.addQuery('u_product', 'IN', productList);
					gs.debug(gs.getMessage('Collecting stakeholders for product list {0}', productList));
				} else {
					// Selected product wasn't found in the platform models, either, so there must not be any other stakeholders to impact.
					return stakeholderList;
				}
			}
		} else {
			//Collect the stakeholders for the passed product.
			grStake.addQuery('u_product', product);
			gs.debug(gs.getMessage('Collecting stakeholders for product {0}', product));
			
		}
		grStake.query();
		while (grStake.next()) {
			stakeholderList += grStake.getUniqueValue() + ',';
		}
		
		return stakeholderList;
	}
							
	function deleteAllProductStakeholders(current, previous) {
		deleteDemandStakeholders(collectProductStakeholders(previous.u_product, false), current.sys_id, true);
									
		deleteDemandStakeholders(collectProductStakeholders(current.u_product, false), current.sys_id, false);
		
		deleteImpactedDemandStakeholders(collectProductStakeholders(previous.u_product, true), current.sys_id, true);
		
		deleteImpactedDemandStakeholders(collectProductStakeholders(current.u_product, true), current.sys_id, false);
	}
	
	//Add impacted stakeholders on the common platform.
	function addImpactedStakeholders(current) {
		//Check for the product in the Application Models table.
		var grApp = new GlideRecord('cmdb_application_product_model');
		var grStake, grAppPlat, m2mGR;
		var productList = '';
		grApp.addQuery('sys_id', current.u_product);
		grApp.query();
		if (grApp.hasNext()) {
			gs.debug(gs.getMessage('Found Application Model {0}.', current.u_product));
			grApp.next();
			//Add records in the impacted stakeholders list for all the other products that have the same platform.
			grAppPlat = new GlideRecord('cmdb_application_product_model');
			var platform = grApp.getValue('u_platform_product_model') || '';
			if (platform.length > 0) {
				grAppPlat.addQuery('u_platform_product_model', platform);
				grAppPlat.addQuery('sys_id','!=',current.getValue('u_product'));
				grAppPlat.query();
				while (grAppPlat.next()) {
					productList += grAppPlat.getUniqueValue() + ',';
				}
				//Add the platform itself.
				productList += grApp.getValue('u_platform_product_model');
				grStake = new GlideRecord('u_expanded_stakeholder_register');
				grStake.addQuery('u_product', 'IN', productList);
				grStake.query();
				while (grStake.next()) {
					gs.debug(gs.getMessage('Adding impacted product stakeholder {0} to demand {1}', [grStake.getDisplayValue(), current.sys_id]));
					m2mGR = new GlideRecord('u_multi_tenant_demand_stakeholder');
					m2mGR.initialize();
					m2mGR.u_demand = current.sys_id;
					m2mGR.u_expanded_stakeholder = grStake.getUniqueValue();
					m2mGR.u_auto_added = true;
					m2mGR.insert();
				}
			}
		} else {
			// No matching application model found, so check whether the passed product is a platform model.
			var grPlat = new GlideRecord('u_cmdb_platform_product_model');
			grPlat.addQuery('sys_id', current.getValue('u_product'));
			grPlat.query();
			if (grPlat.hasNext()) {
				gs.debug(gs.getMessage('Found Platform Model {0}.', current.getValue('u_product')));
				//Collect the list of application products that use the selected platform.
				grAppPlat = new GlideRecord('cmdb_application_product_model');
				grAppPlat.addQuery('u_platform_product_model', current.getValue('u_product'));
				grAppPlat.query();
				while (grAppPlat.next()) {
					productList += grAppPlat.getUniqueValue() + ',';
				}
				//Collect the stakeholders for the list of products found.
				grStake = new GlideRecord('u_expanded_stakeholder_register');
				grStake.addQuery('u_product', 'IN', productList);
				grStake.query();
				while (grStake.next()) {
					gs.debug(gs.getMessage('Adding impacted product stakeholder {0} to demand {1}', [grStake.getDisplayValue(), current.sys_id]));
					m2mGR = new GlideRecord('u_multi_tenant_demand_stakeholder');
					m2mGR.initialize();
					m2mGR.u_demand = current.sys_id;
					m2mGR.u_expanded_stakeholder = grStake.getUniqueValue();
					m2mGR.u_auto_added = true;
					m2mGR.insert();
				}
			}
		}
	}
											   
	// Add new stakeholders for the current product and its associated platform product.
	function addProductStakeholders(current) {
		//Add any stakeholders that reference the standalone product.
		grStake = new GlideRecord('u_expanded_stakeholder_register');
		grStake.addQuery('u_product', current.u_product);
		grStake.query();
		while (grStake.next()) {
			gs.debug(gs.getMessage('Adding product stakeholder {0} to demand {1}', [grStake.getDisplayValue(), current.sys_id]));
			m2mGR = new GlideRecord('dmn_m2m_demand_stakeholder');
			m2mGR.initialize();
			m2mGR.demand = current.sys_id;
			m2mGR.u_expanded_stakeholder = grStake.getUniqueValue();
			m2mGR.auto = true;
			m2mGR.insert();
		}
		
		addImpactedStakeholders(current);
	}
											
	if (!previous.primary_program.nil()) {
		// Delete stakeholders associated with the previously selected program.
		gs.debug(gs.getMessage('Deleting program stakeholders'));
		deleteProgramStakeholders(current, previous);
	} else {
		// Delete stakeholders associated with the previously selected portfolio only
		// if there was no previously selected program.
		if (!previous.portfolio.nil()) {
			deletePortfolioStakeholders(current, previous);
			gs.debug(gs.getMessage('Deleting portfolio stakeholders'));
		}
	}
											
	if (!current.primary_program.nil()) {
		gs.debug(gs.getMessage('Adding program stakeholders.'));
		addProgramStakeholders(current);
	} else {
		// Only add portfolio stakeholders if no program is selected.
		if (!current.portfolio.nil()) {
			gs.debug(gs.getMessage('Adding portfolio stakeholders'));
			addPortfolioStakeholders(current);
		}
	}
										
	if (!previous.u_product.nil()) {
		gs.debug(gs.getMessage('Deleting product stakeholders'));
		deleteAllProductStakeholders(current, previous);
	}
											
	if(!current.u_product.nil()) {
		gs.debug(gs.getMessage('Adding product stakeholders for {0}', current.u_product));
		addProductStakeholders(current);
	}
											
})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>Keith.Tucker@hhs.gov</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-10-19 20:00:45</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>38b24ffcdb51a3006bb976740f96197c</sys_id><sys_mod_count>70</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Populate Demand Stakeholders</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_38b24ffcdb51a3006bb976740f96197c</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>Keith.Tucker@hhs.gov</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-10-29 20:26:52</sys_updated_on><template/><when>after</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=38b24ffcdb51a3006bb976740f96197c"/></record_update>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>true</action_delete><action_insert>false</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>false</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>dmn_demand</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>true</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Auto deletion rule for Assessments</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[function onBefore(current, previous) { 
   new global.AssessmentUtils().checkDeleteRecord(current, '49fb8f4fdb5de7006bb976740f9619a8', true);
}]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>Keith.Tucker@hhs.gov</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-10-26 20:30:19</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path/><sys_id>d69c4b4fdb5de7006bb976740f96197d</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Auto deletion rule for Assessments</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_d69c4b4fdb5de7006bb976740f96197d</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>Keith.Tucker@hhs.gov</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-10-26 20:30:19</sys_updated_on><template/><when>before</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=d69c4b4fdb5de7006bb976740f96197d"/></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_abea62348f72110040f82ab2f0f92314
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>public</access><active>true</active><api_name>global.DemandUtil</api_name><client_callable>true</client_callable><description>Utility functions for Demand Management Application</description><name>DemandUtil</name><script><![CDATA[/**
 * JavaScript utility functions for Demand Management
 *
 */

var DemandUtil = Class.create();


DemandUtil.prototype = {
	
	checkIfAssessmentExists : function(current) {
		var gr = new GlideRecord('asmt_assessment_instance_question');
		gr.addEncodedQuery('source_id=' + current.demand.sys_id + '^instance.user.sys_id=' + current.stakeholder.user.sys_id + '^instance.state!=canceled');
		gr.query();
		
		if (gr.next())
			return true;
		return false;
	},
	
	checkAndUpdateDemandIfAssessmentsComplete : function(instanceSysId) {
		var gr = new GlideRecord('asmt_assessment_instance_question');
		gr.addQuery('instance', instanceSysId);
		gr.query();
		if (gr.next()) {
			var questionGR = new GlideAggregate('asmt_assessment_instance_question');
			questionGR.addQuery('source_id', gr.getValue('source_id'));
			questionGR.groupBy('instance');
			questionGR.query();
			while (questionGR.next()) {
				if (!(questionGR.instance.state == 'complete' || questionGR.instance.state == 'canceled'))
					return false;
			}
			// All assessments completed
			var demandGR = new GlideRecord('dmn_demand');
			if (demandGR.get(gr.getValue('source_id')) && demandGR.state == 3) {
				demandGR.state = -4;
				demandGR.update();
			}
			return true;
		}
		return false;
	},
	
	type : 'DemandUtil'
};

DemandUtil.getDemandRole = function(suffix, tableName /* Stripped table name */){
	var role = 'it_demand_'+suffix;
	if(GlidePluginManager.isActive('com.snc.project_management_v3')){
		role = SNC.PPMConfig.getDemandRole(suffix,tableName);
	}
	return role;
};

DemandUtil.getDemandWorkbenchId = function(sysClassName, sysId) {
    var workbenchId;
    var gr = new GlideRecord("bubble_chart_workbench");

    // Default to the base table when both parameters are not sent
    if (gs.nil(sysClassName) && gs.nil(sysId))
        sysClassName = 'dmn_demand';

    if (!gs.nil(sysClassName)) {
        /* Get TeamSpace specific demand table name */
        var demandTable = SNC.PPMConfig.getDemandTable(sysClassName);
        gr.addQuery("table", demandTable);
    }
    if (!gs.nil(sysId))
        gr.addQuery('sys_id', sysId);
    else
        gr.addQuery("isdefault", true);
    gr.query();
    if (gr.next()) {
        workbenchId = gr.getValue("sys_id");
    }
    return workbenchId;
};


DemandUtil.isValidWorkbenchParams = function(sysClassName, workbenchId) {
    return JSUtil.notNil(DemandUtil.getDemandWorkbenchId(sysClassName, workbenchId));
};

DemandUtil.isValidStakeHolder = function(demand) {
    
var gr = new GlideRecord('dmn_m2m_demand_stakeholder');
gr.addQuery('stakeholder.user', gs.getUserID());
gr.addQuery('demand',demand);
gr.setLimit(1);
gr.query();

var answer = gr.getRowCount() > 0;
	
return answer;
};]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2014-02-07 18:10:41</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_id>abea62348f72110040f82ab2f0f92314</sys_id><sys_mod_count>29</sys_mod_count><sys_name>DemandUtil</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Demand Management" source="com.snc.demand_management">db6982ff6f390200d45331012e3ee4de</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_abea62348f72110040f82ab2f0f92314</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>Keith.Tucker@hhs.gov</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-11-08 20:09:35</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_31c0b5d7dba9a3406bb976740f961909
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>false</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>asmt_assessment_instance</collection><condition>current.state=='complete'</condition><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition table="asmt_assessment_instance">metric_type=0556fa9a8f12110040f82ab2f0f923f8^ORmetric_type=49fb8f4fdb5de7006bb976740f9619a8^EQ<item display_table="asmt_metric_type" display_value="Demand" endquery="false" field="metric_type" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value="0556fa9a8f12110040f82ab2f0f923f8"/><item display_table="asmt_metric_type" display_value="Multi-tenant Demand" endquery="false" field="metric_type" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="true" value="49fb8f4fdb5de7006bb976740f9619a8"/><item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/></filter_condition><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Moot Remaining Demand Assessments</name><order>90</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {

	if (!JSUtil.nil(current.related_table_1) && !JSUtil.nil(current.related_id_1)) {
		// Check the related record to see if we should treat its assessments as a group.
		var grRelated = new GlideRecord(current.related_table_1);
		if (grRelated.get(current.related_id_1)) {
			var acceptFirstResponse = grRelated.getValue('u_accept_first_response') == 'yes';
			if (acceptFirstResponse) {
				// Find all other assessment instances for the same combination of trigger_table, trigger_id, related_table_1, related_id_1
				// and set them cancelled.
				var grInstance = new GlideRecord('asmt_assessment_instance');
				grInstance.addQuery('trigger_table', current.trigger_table);
				grInstance.addQuery('trigger_id', current.trigger_id);
				grInstance.addQuery('related_table_1', current.related_table_1);
				grInstance.addQuery('related_id_1', current.related_id_1);
				grInstance.addQuery('sys_id', '!=', current.sys_id);
				grInstance.query();
				while (grInstance.next()) {
					gs.debug(gs.getMessage('Cancelling assessment {0}', grInstance.getUniqueValue()));
					grInstance.setValue('state', 'canceled');
					grInstance.update();
				}
			}
		}
	}

})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>Keith.Tucker@hhs.gov</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-11-08 18:53:58</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>31c0b5d7dba9a3406bb976740f961909</sys_id><sys_mod_count>5</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Moot Remaining Demand Assessments</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_31c0b5d7dba9a3406bb976740f961909</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>Keith.Tucker@hhs.gov</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-11-08 20:03:46</sys_updated_on><template/><when>before</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=31c0b5d7dba9a3406bb976740f961909"/></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_575b7958dba86b006bb976740f961900
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>dmn_stakeholder_register</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Validate</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[var user = current.user;
var portfolio = current.portfolio;
var program  = current.u_program;
var product = current.u_product;

var dataUser = new GlideRecord('dmn_stakeholder_register');

if (!gs.nil(portfolio) && gs.nil(program)) {
	dataUser.addQuery('user', user);
	dataUser.addQuery('portfolio', portfolio);
	dataUser.addQuery('sys_id', '!=', current.sys_id);
	dataUser.query();
	
	// Issue the query to the database to get all records
	if (dataUser.next()) {
		gs.addErrorMessage(gs.getMessage('User and Portfolio combination already exists'));
		current.setAbortAction(true);
	}
}
else if (!gs.nil(program)) {
	dataUser.addQuery('user', user);
	dataUser.addQuery('program', program);
	dataUser.addQuery('sys_id', '!=', current.sys_id);
	dataUser.query();
	
	// Issue the query to the database to get all records
	if (dataUser.next()) {
		gs.addErrorMessage(gs.getMessage('User and Portfolio combination already exists'));
		current.setAbortAction(true);
	}
}
else if (!gs.nil(product)) {
	dataUser.addQuery('user', user);
	dataUser.addQuery('u_product', product);
	dataUser.addQuery('sys_id', '!=', current.sys_id);
	dataUser.query();
	
	// Issue the query to the database to get all records
	if (dataUser.next()) {
		gs.addErrorMessage(gs.getMessage('User and Product combination already exists'));
		current.setAbortAction(true);
	}
}
else
	{
	    gs.addErrorMessage(gs.getMessage('Portfolio or Program or Product cannot be empty'));
		current.setAbortAction(true);
	}
]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>Michael.Ocasio@hhs.gov</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-09-10 18:45:01</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>575b7958dba86b006bb976740f961900</sys_id><sys_mod_count>17</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Validate</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_575b7958dba86b006bb976740f961900</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>Michael.Ocasio@hhs.gov</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-09-17 19:30:25</sys_updated_on><template/><when>before</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=575b7958dba86b006bb976740f961900"/></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_c77e2910dba86b006bb976740f9619db
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="DELETE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>false</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>dmn_stakeholder_register</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Validate</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[var user = current.user;
var portfolio = current.portfolio;
var program = current.u_program;
var product = current.u_product;

var getStakeHolderRegister = new ValidateStakeHolderRegister();

if (getStakeHolderRegister.getValuesFromStakeHolderRegister(user,portfolio)) {
	gs.addErrorMessage(gs.getMessage('User and Portfolio combination already exists'));
	exit();
}

if (getStakeHolderRegister.getValuesFromStakeHolderRegister(user,program)) {
	gs.addErrorMessage(gs.getMessage('User and Program combination already exists'));
}

if (getStakeHolderRegister.getValuesFromStakeHolderRegister(user,product))
	{
	gs.addErrorMessage(gs.getMessage('User and Product combination already exists'));
}
]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>Michael.Ocasio@hhs.gov</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-09-10 17:48:44</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>c77e2910dba86b006bb976740f9619db</sys_id><sys_mod_count>11</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Validate</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_c77e2910dba86b006bb976740f9619db</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>Michael.Ocasio@hhs.gov</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-09-10 18:40:24</sys_updated_on><template/><when>before</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=c77e2910dba86b006bb976740f9619db"/></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_a5c569dbdbd0e7006bb976740f96195d
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>false</active><api_name>global.getPortfolioProductIds</api_name><client_callable>false</client_callable><description>Helper function for product reference qualifier to fetch products belonging to a portfolio or products or not associated to any portfolio</description><name>getPortfolioProductIds</name><script><![CDATA[function getPortfolioProductIds(portfolio, referenceTable) {
    var ids = [];
	var productTable = SNC.PPMConfig.getProgramTable(referenceTable);
    var productGr = new GlideRecord(productTable); 
	productGr.addQuery('sys_class_name', productTable);
    if(JSUtil.notNil(portfolio)) {
		var qc = productGr.addNullQuery('portfolio');
        qc.addOrCondition('portfolio', '=', portfolio);
    }
    productGr.query();
    while (productGr.next()) {
        ids.push(productGr.getValue('sys_id'));
    }
    return ids;
}]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>Michael.Ocasio@hhs.gov</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-09-07 14:42:07</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_id>a5c569dbdbd0e7006bb976740f96195d</sys_id><sys_mod_count>7</sys_mod_count><sys_name>getPortfolioProductIds</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_a5c569dbdbd0e7006bb976740f96195d</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>Michael.Ocasio@hhs.gov</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-09-12 15:58:17</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>dmn_demand</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition table="dmn_demand">portfolioVALCHANGES^ORprimary_programVALCHANGES^EQ<item endquery="false" field="portfolio" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="VALCHANGES" or="false" value=""/><item endquery="false" field="primary_program" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="VALCHANGES" or="true" value=""/><item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/></filter_condition><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Validate program belongs to portfolio</name><order>103</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous) {
	
	if (current.primary_program.nil())
		return;
	var program = current.primary_program.getRefRecord();
	var isGlobalProgram = program.portfolio.nil();
	if (isGlobalProgram)
		return;
	if ( current.portfolio.nil() )
		current.portfolio = program.getValue('portfolio');
	
	if (program.getValue('portfolio') != current.getValue('portfolio') ) {
		gs.addErrorMessage(gs.getMessage('Program {0} does not belong to {1}',[program.getDisplayValue(), current.portfolio.getDisplayValue()]));
		current.setAbortAction(true);
	}
	
})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>Michael.Ocasio@hhs.gov</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-09-11 19:23:43</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>8cdd4be0dba4eb006373748e0f961923</sys_id><sys_mod_count>4</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Validate program belongs to portfolio</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_8cdd4be0dba4eb006373748e0f961923</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>Michael.Ocasio@hhs.gov</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-09-25 20:19:45</sys_updated_on><template/><when>before</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=8cdd4be0dba4eb006373748e0f961923"/></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_e37f4cb6db54a7006373748e0f96198a
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="DELETE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>dmn_demand</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition table="dmn_demand">portfolioVALCHANGES^portfolioISNOTEMPTY^primary_programISEMPTY^u_productISEMPTY^EQ<item endquery="false" field="portfolio" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="VALCHANGES" or="false" value=""/><item endquery="false" field="portfolio" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="ISNOTEMPTY" or="false" value=""/><item endquery="false" field="primary_program" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="ISEMPTY" or="false" value=""/><item endquery="false" field="u_product" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="ISEMPTY" or="false" value=""/><item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/></filter_condition><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>`</name><order>105</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[// Delete all the auto populated stakeholders for the previous portfolio
function deleteStakeholders() {
	var gr = new GlideRecord('dmn_stakeholder_register');
	var m2mGR = "";
	var stakeHolderList = "";
	
	gr.addQuery('portfolio', previous.portfolio);
	gr.query();
	
	if (gr.hasNext()) {
		m2mGR = new GlideRecord('dmn_m2m_demand_stakeholder');
		
		while(gr.next()) {
			stakeHolderList += gr.getUniqueValue();
			stakeHolderList += ",";
		}
		m2mGR.addQuery('stakeholder', 'IN', stakeHolderList);
		m2mGR.addQuery('demand', current.sys_id);
		m2mGR.addQuery('auto', true);
		m2mGR.deleteMultiple();
	}
	
	gr = new GlideRecord('dmn_stakeholder_register');
	gr.addQuery('portfolio', current.portfolio);
	gr.query();
	
	if (gr.hasNext()) {
		m2mGR = new GlideRecord('dmn_m2m_demand_stakeholder');
		stakeHolderList = "";
		while(gr.next()) {
			stakeHolderList += gr.getUniqueValue();
			stakeHolderList += ",";
		}
		m2mGR.addQuery('stakeholder', 'IN', stakeHolderList);
		m2mGR.addQuery('demand', current.sys_id);
		m2mGR.deleteMultiple();
	}
}

function addStakeholders() {
	// Add new stakeholders for the current portfolio
	var gr = new GlideRecord('dmn_stakeholder_register');
	gr.addQuery('portfolio', current.portfolio);
	gr.query();
	while(gr.next()) {
		var m2mGR = new GlideRecord('dmn_m2m_demand_stakeholder');
		m2mGR.initialize();
		m2mGR.demand = current.sys_id;
		m2mGR.stakeholder = gr.getUniqueValue();
		m2mGR.auto = true;
		m2mGR.insert();
	}
}


if (!previous.portfolio.nil())
{
	gs.addInfoMessage('Portfolio');
	deleteStakeholders();
}
addStakeholders();
]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>Michael.Ocasio@hhs.gov</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-09-05 19:02:50</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>e37f4cb6db54a7006373748e0f96198a</sys_id><sys_mod_count>65</sys_mod_count><sys_name>`</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_e37f4cb6db54a7006373748e0f96198a</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>Michael.Ocasio@hhs.gov</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-09-11 16:26:37</sys_updated_on><template/><when>after</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=e37f4cb6db54a7006373748e0f96198a"/></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_c53580c6c3322100348dd02422d3aed8
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>false</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>dmn_stakeholder_register</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Validate</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[var user = current.user;
var portfolio = current.portfolio;
if (gs.nil(user) || gs.nil(portfolio)) {
	gs.addErrorMessage(gs.getMessage('User and Portfolio cannot be empty'));
	current.setAbortAction(true);
}

var user_portfolio = new GlideRecord('dmn_stakeholder_register');
user_portfolio.addQuery('user', user);
user_portfolio.addQuery('portfolio', portfolio);
user_portfolio.addQuery('sys_id', '!=', current.sys_id);
user_portfolio.query();

// Issue the query to the database to get all records
if (user_portfolio.next()) {
	gs.addErrorMessage(gs.getMessage('User and Portfolio combination already exists'));
	current.setAbortAction(true);
}
]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2014-08-28 23:30:29</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>c53580c6c3322100348dd02422d3aed8</sys_id><sys_mod_count>12</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Validate</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Demand Management" source="com.snc.demand_management">db6982ff6f390200d45331012e3ee4de</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_c53580c6c3322100348dd02422d3aed8</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>Michael.Ocasio@hhs.gov</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-09-10 18:44:54</sys_updated_on><template/><when>before</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=c53580c6c3322100348dd02422d3aed8"/></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_3d33aec5dbac23006373748e0f9619bd
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>global.ValidateStakeHolderRegister</api_name><client_callable>false</client_callable><description>Verify if user is being associate with a Portfolio, Program or Product in the StakeHolder Register Table</description><name>ValidateStakeHolderRegister</name><script><![CDATA[var ValidateStakeHolderRegister = Class.create();
ValidateStakeHolderRegister.prototype = {
	initialize: function() {
		var user_stakeHolder = new GlideRecord('dmn_stakeholder_register');
		user_stakeHolder.addQuery('user', current.user);
		user_stakeHolder.addQuery('sys_id', '!=', current.sys_id);
		
	},
	verifyData : function(level)
	{
		//if (level == "portfolio") {
			//gs.addErrorMessage("New Portfolio");
			//user_stakeHolder.addQuery('user', current.user);
			user_stakeHolder.addQuery("'" + level  + "'", level);
			//user_stakeHolder.addQuery('sys_id', '!=', current.sys_id);
			user_stakeHolder.query();
			
			// Issue the query to the database to get all records
			if (user_stakeHolder.next()) {
				gs.addErrorMessage(gs.getMessage('User and Portfolio combination already exists'));
				current.setAbortAction(true);
			}
		//}
	},
	type: 'ValidateStakeHolderRegister'
};]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>Michael.Ocasio@hhs.gov</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-09-13 05:50:44</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_id>3d33aec5dbac23006373748e0f9619bd</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>ValidateStakeHolderRegister</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_3d33aec5dbac23006373748e0f9619bd</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>Michael.Ocasio@hhs.gov</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-09-13 05:55:04</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_8155a4018f32110040f82ab2f0f92323
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access/><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>false</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>dmn_demand</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition table="dmn_demand">portfolioVALCHANGES^portfolioISNOTEMPTY^EQ<item endquery="false" field="portfolio" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="VALCHANGES" or="false" value=""/><item endquery="false" field="portfolio" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="ISNOTEMPTY" or="false" value=""/><item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/></filter_condition><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Populate Stakeholders based on Portfolio</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[// Delete all the auto populated stakeholders for the previous portfolio
function deleteStakeholders() {
	var gr = new GlideRecord('dmn_stakeholder_register');
	gr.addQuery('portfolio', previous.portfolio);
	gr.query();
	
	if (gr.hasNext()) {
		var m2mGR = new GlideRecord('dmn_m2m_demand_stakeholder');
		var stakeHolderList = "";
		while(gr.next()) {
			stakeHolderList += gr.getUniqueValue();
			stakeHolderList += ",";
		}
		m2mGR.addQuery('stakeholder', 'IN', stakeHolderList);
		m2mGR.addQuery('demand', current.sys_id);
		m2mGR.addQuery('auto', true);
		m2mGR.deleteMultiple();
	}
	
	gr = new GlideRecord('dmn_stakeholder_register');
	gr.addQuery('portfolio', current.portfolio);
	gr.query();
	
	if (gr.hasNext()) {
		m2mGR = new GlideRecord('dmn_m2m_demand_stakeholder');
		stakeHolderList = "";
		while(gr.next()) {
			stakeHolderList += gr.getUniqueValue();
			stakeHolderList += ",";
		}
		m2mGR.addQuery('stakeholder', 'IN', stakeHolderList);
		m2mGR.addQuery('demand', current.sys_id);
		m2mGR.deleteMultiple();
	}
}

function addStakeholders() {
	// Add new stakeholders for the current portfolio
	var gr = new GlideRecord('dmn_stakeholder_register');
	gr.addQuery('portfolio', current.portfolio);
	gr.query();
	while(gr.next()) {
		var m2mGR = new GlideRecord('dmn_m2m_demand_stakeholder');
		m2mGR.initialize();
		m2mGR.demand = current.sys_id;
		m2mGR.stakeholder = gr.getUniqueValue();
		m2mGR.auto = true;
		m2mGR.insert();
	}
}

if (!previous.portfolio.nil())
	deleteStakeholders();
addStakeholders();



]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2014-02-08 03:17:59</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>8155a4018f32110040f82ab2f0f92323</sys_id><sys_mod_count>27</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Populate Stakeholders based on Portfolio</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Demand Management" source="com.snc.demand_management">db6982ff6f390200d45331012e3ee4de</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_8155a4018f32110040f82ab2f0f92323</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>Michael.Ocasio@hhs.gov</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-09-14 18:26:07</sys_updated_on><template/><when>after</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=8155a4018f32110040f82ab2f0f92323"/></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="DELETE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>false</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>dmn_demand</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition table="dmn_demand">primary_programISNOTEMPTY^primary_programVALCHANGES^EQ<item endquery="false" field="primary_program" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="ISNOTEMPTY" or="false" value=""/><item endquery="false" field="primary_program" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="VALCHANGES" or="false" value=""/><item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/></filter_condition><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Populate Stakeholders based of Program</name><order>103</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[function deleteProgramInStakeholders() {
	var gr = new GlideRecord('dmn_stakeholder_register');
	var m2mGR = "";
	var stakeHolderList = "";
	
	gr.addQuery('u_program', previous.primary_program);
	gr.query();
	
	if (gr.hasNext()) {
		gs.addInfoMessage(current.primary_program.getDisplayValue());	
		m2mGR = new GlideRecord('dmn_m2m_demand_stakeholder');
		stakeHolderList = "";
		while(gr.next()) {
			stakeHolderList += gr.getUniqueValue();
			gs.addInfoMessage(gr.getDisplayValue('user'));
			stakeHolderList += ",";
		}
		m2mGR.addQuery('stakeholder', 'IN', stakeHolderList);
		m2mGR.addQuery('demand', current.sys_id);
		m2mGR.addQuery('auto', true);
		m2mGR.deleteMultiple();
	}
	
	gr = new GlideRecord('dmn_stakeholder_register');
	gr.addQuery('u_program', current.primary_program);
	gr.query();
	
	if (gr.hasNext()) {
		m2mGR = new GlideRecord('dmn_m2m_demand_stakeholder');
		stakeHolderList = "";
		while(gra.next()) {
			stakeHolderList += gr.getUniqueValue();
			stakeHolderList += ",";
		}
		m2mGR.addQuery('stakeholder', 'IN', stakeHolderList);
		m2mGR.addQuery('demand', current.sys_id);
		m2mGR.deleteMultiple();
	}
}

function addProgramInStakeholders() {
	// Add new stakeholders for the current program
	var gr = new GlideRecord('dmn_stakeholder_register');
	gr.addQuery('u_program', current.primary_program);
	gr.query();
	while(gr.next()) {
		var m2mGR = new GlideRecord('dmn_m2m_demand_stakeholder');
		m2mGR.initialize();
		m2mGR.demand = current.sys_id;
		m2mGR.stakeholder = gr.getUniqueValue();
		m2mGR.auto = true;
		m2mGR.insert();
	}
}

if (!previous.u_program.nil()) {
	gs.addInfoMessage('Program');
	deleteProgramInStakeholders();
} 
addProgramInStakeholders();]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>Michael.Ocasio@hhs.gov</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-09-06 19:15:20</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>4f4bd903dbd0e7006373748e0f961995</sys_id><sys_mod_count>31</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Populate Stakeholders based of Program</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_4f4bd903dbd0e7006373748e0f961995</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>Michael.Ocasio@hhs.gov</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-09-11 18:25:10</sys_updated_on><template/><when>after</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=4f4bd903dbd0e7006373748e0f961995"/></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="DELETE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>false</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>dmn_demand</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition table="dmn_demand">u_productISNOTEMPTY^u_productVALCHANGES^EQ<item endquery="false" field="u_product" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="ISNOTEMPTY" or="false" value=""/><item endquery="false" field="u_product" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="VALCHANGES" or="false" value=""/><item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/></filter_condition><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Populate Stakeholders based of Products</name><order>104</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[// Delete all the auto populated stakeholders for the previous u_products
function deleteProductsInStakeholders() {
	var gr = new GlideRecord('dmn_stakeholder_register');
	var m2mGR = "";
	var stakeHolderList = "";
	
	gr.addQuery('u_product', previous.u_product);
	gr.query();
	
	if (gr.hasNext()) {
		gs.addInfoMessage(current.u_product.getDisplayValue());	
		m2mGR = new GlideRecord('dmn_m2m_demand_stakeholder');
		while(gr.next()) {
			stakeHolderList += gr.getUniqueValue();
			stakeHolderList += ",";
		}
		m2mGR.addQuery('stakeholder', 'IN', stakeHolderList);
		m2mGR.addQuery('demand', current.sys_id);
		m2mGR.addQuery('auto', true);
		m2mGR.deleteMultiple();
	}
	
	gr = new GlideRecord('dmn_stakeholder_register');
	gr.addQuery('u_product', current.u_product);
	gr.query();
	
	if (gr.hasNext()) {
		m2mGR = new GlideRecord('dmn_m2m_demand_stakeholder');
		stakeHolderList = "";
		while(gr.next()) {
			stakeHolderList += gr.getUniqueValue();
			stakeHolderList += ",";
		}
		m2mGR.addQuery('stakeholder', 'IN', stakeHolderList);
		m2mGR.addQuery('demand', current.sys_id);
		m2mGR.deleteMultiple();
	}
}

function addProductsInStakeholders() {
	// Add new stakeholders for the current portfolio
	var gr = new GlideRecord('dmn_stakeholder_register');
	gr.addQuery('u_product', current.u_product);
	gr.query();
	while(gr.next()) {
		var m2mGR = new GlideRecord('dmn_m2m_demand_stakeholder');
		m2mGR.initialize();
		m2mGR.demand = current.sys_id;
		m2mGR.stakeholder = gr.getUniqueValue();
		m2mGR.auto = true;
		m2mGR.insert();
	}
}


if (!previous.u_products.nil()){
	gs.addInfoMessage('Products');
	deleteProductsInStakeholders();
}
addProductsInStakeholders();
]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>Michael.Ocasio@hhs.gov</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-09-06 19:28:28</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>aa7e91c3dbd0e7006373748e0f9619d5</sys_id><sys_mod_count>16</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Populate Stakeholders based of Products</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_aa7e91c3dbd0e7006373748e0f9619d5</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>Michael.Ocasio@hhs.gov</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-09-11 18:28:11</sys_updated_on><template/><when>after</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=aa7e91c3dbd0e7006373748e0f9619d5"/></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_fa1bd517dbd0e7006bb976740f9619f9
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="DELETE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>false</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>dmn_demand</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition table="dmn_demand">portfolioVALCHANGES^ORu_productVALCHANGES^EQ<item endquery="false" field="portfolio" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="VALCHANGES" or="false" value=""/><item endquery="false" field="u_product" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="VALCHANGES" or="true" value=""/><item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/></filter_condition><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Validate product belongs to portfolio</name><order>101</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {

	if (current.u_product.nil())
		return;
	var product = current.u_product.getRefRecord();
	var isGlobalProduct = product.portfolio.nil();
	if (isGlobalProduct)
		return;
	if ( current.portfolio.nil() )
		current.portfolio = product.getValue('portfolio');
	
	if (product.getValue('portfolio') != current.getValue('portfolio') ) {
		gs.addErrorMessage(gs.getMessage('Product {0} does not belong to {1}',[product.getDisplayValue(), current.portfolio.getDisplayValue()]));
		current.setAbortAction(true);
	}

})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>Michael.Ocasio@hhs.gov</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-09-07 13:51:10</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>fa1bd517dbd0e7006bb976740f9619f9</sys_id><sys_mod_count>7</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Validate product belongs to portfolio</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_fa1bd517dbd0e7006bb976740f9619f9</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>Michael.Ocasio@hhs.gov</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-09-10 16:46:25</sys_updated_on><template/><when>before</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=fa1bd517dbd0e7006bb976740f9619f9"/></record_update>

	if (current.primary_program.nil())
		return;
	var program = current.primary_program.getRefRecord();
	var isGlobalProgram = program.portfolio.nil();
	if (isGlobalProgram)
		return;
	if ( current.portfolio.nil() )
		current.portfolio = program.getValue('portfolio');
	
	if (program.getValue('portfolio') != current.getValue('portfolio') ) {
		gs.addErrorMessage(gs.getMessage('Program {0} does not belong to {1}',[program.getDisplayValue(), current.portfolio.getDisplayValue()]));
			current.setAbortAction(true);
		}
		
	})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>Michael.Ocasio@hhs.gov</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-09-18 14:17:09</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>73f90a72db24a7006bb976740f961939</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Validate program belongs to portfolio</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_73f90a72db24a7006bb976740f961939</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>Michael.Ocasio@hhs.gov</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-09-18 14:23:02</sys_updated_on><template/><when>before</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=73f90a72db24a7006bb976740f961939"/></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_2ed669a193373200ea933007f67ffb64
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>dmn_demand</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition table="dmn_demand">portfolioVALCHANGES^ORprimary_programVALCHANGES^EQ<item endquery="false" field="portfolio" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="VALCHANGES" or="false" value=""/><item endquery="false" field="primary_program" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="VALCHANGES" or="true" value=""/><item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/></filter_condition><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Update Related Portfolios in Program</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous) {
	
	if(current.operation() == 'insert' && current.portfolio.nil())
		return;
	
	var synchronizer = new ProgramRelatedPortfoliosSync(current);
	synchronizer.run();
	
	if(current.primary_program.changes() && !previous.portfolio.nil()){
		synchronizer = new ProgramRelatedPortfoliosSync(previous);
		synchronizer.run();
	}
	
})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2017-07-06 15:21:34</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>2ed669a193373200ea933007f67ffb64</sys_id><sys_mod_count>4</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Update Related Portfolios in Program</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Program Management" source="com.snc.program_management">6a113481db0132009a3670131f96192f</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_2ed669a193373200ea933007f67ffb64</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>Michael.Ocasio@hhs.gov</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-09-10 15:17:48</sys_updated_on><template/><when>after</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=2ed669a193373200ea933007f67ffb64"/></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_726909f5dbfc6f006bb976740f961965
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="DELETE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>false</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>dmn_demand</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition table="dmn_demand">portfolioVALCHANGES^EQ<item endquery="false" field="portfolio" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="VALCHANGES" or="false" value=""/><item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/></filter_condition><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Populate Stakeholders based on Portfolio</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[
	var stakeHolderRegister = new StakeHolderRegister('dmn_m2m_demand_stakeholder', 'demand');

if (!previous.portfolio.nil()) {
	stakeHolderRegister.deleteStakeHolders(previous.portfolio, current.sys_id);
	
	if(current.portfolio)
		stakeHolderRegister.deleteStakeHolders(current.portfolio, current.sys_id);
}

if(current.portfolio)
	stakeHolderRegister.addStakeHolders(current.portfolio, current.sys_id);
]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>Michael.Ocasio@hhs.gov</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-09-27 17:17:01</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>726909f5dbfc6f006bb976740f961965</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Populate Stakeholders based on Portfolio</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_726909f5dbfc6f006bb976740f961965</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>Michael.Ocasio@hhs.gov</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-09-27 17:21:51</sys_updated_on><template/><when>after</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=726909f5dbfc6f006bb976740f961965"/></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_b29561d8db686b006bb976740f9619dd
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="DELETE"><access>package_private</access><active>false</active><api_name>global.ValidateStakeHolderRegister</api_name><client_callable>false</client_callable><description>Rewrote the business rule call to Validate the StakeHolder Register table to prevent duplication of records from the current user and Portfolio but also apply the validation for Program and Product fields. </description><name>ValidateStakeHolderRegister</name><script><![CDATA[var ValidateStakeHolderRegister = Class.create();
ValidateStakeHolderRegister.prototype = {
	initialize: function() {
	},
	
	getValuesFromStakeHolderRegister :function(user,level){

		var user_level = new GlideRecord('dmn_stakeholder_register');
		
		user_level.addQuery('user', user);
		
		if (level == 'porfolio')
			user_level.addQuery('portfolio', portfolio);
		else if (level == 'program')
			user_level.addQuery('program', program);
		else if (level == 'product')
			user_level.addQuery('product', product);
			
		user_level.addQuery('sys_id', '!=', current.sys_id);
		
		user_level.query();
		
		// Issue the query to the database to get all records
		if (user_level.next()) 
			return true;
	},
	type: 'ValidateStakeHolderRegister'
};]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>Michael.Ocasio@hhs.gov</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-09-10 17:57:55</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_id>b29561d8db686b006bb976740f9619dd</sys_id><sys_mod_count>8</sys_mod_count><sys_name>ValidateStakeHolderRegister</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_b29561d8db686b006bb976740f9619dd</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>Michael.Ocasio@hhs.gov</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-09-10 18:40:14</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_a23e7f147f23020013d091679ffa9178
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="DELETE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>false</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>dmn_demand</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition table="dmn_demand">portfolioVALCHANGES^ORprimary_programVALCHANGES^EQ<item endquery="false" field="portfolio" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="VALCHANGES" or="false" value=""/><item endquery="false" field="primary_program" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="VALCHANGES" or="true" value=""/><item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/></filter_condition><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Validate program belongs to portfolio</name><order>103</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous) {
	
	if (current.primary_program.nil())
		return;
	var program = current.primary_program.getRefRecord();
	var isGlobalProgram = program.portfolio.nil();
	if (isGlobalProgram)
		return;
	if ( current.portfolio.nil() )
		current.portfolio = program.getValue('portfolio');
	
	if (program.getValue('portfolio') != current.getValue('portfolio') ) {
		gs.addErrorMessage(gs.getMessage('Program {0} does not belong to {1}',[program.getDisplayValue(), current.portfolio.getDisplayValue()]));
		current.setAbortAction(true);
	}
	
})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2015-11-02 06:21:00</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>a23e7f147f23020013d091679ffa9178</sys_id><sys_mod_count>18</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Validate program belongs to portfolio</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Program Management" source="com.snc.program_management">6a113481db0132009a3670131f96192f</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_a23e7f147f23020013d091679ffa9178</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>Michael.Ocasio@hhs.gov</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-09-11 19:23:33</sys_updated_on><template/><when>before</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=a23e7f147f23020013d091679ffa9178"/></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_e55103e4db64eb006373748e0f9619ae
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>dmn_demand</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition table="dmn_demand">portfolioVALCHANGES^portfolioISNOTEMPTY^NQu_productVALCHANGES^u_productISNOTEMPTY^NQprimary_programVALCHANGES^EQ<item endquery="false" field="portfolio" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="VALCHANGES" or="false" value=""/><item endquery="false" field="portfolio" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="ISNOTEMPTY" or="false" value=""/><item endquery="false" field="u_product" goto="false" newquery="true" operator="VALCHANGES" or="false" value=""/><item endquery="false" field="u_product" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="ISNOTEMPTY" or="false" value=""/><item endquery="false" field="primary_program" goto="false" newquery="true" operator="VALCHANGES" or="false" value=""/><item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/></filter_condition><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Populate Stakeholders based on Portfolio</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[// Delete all the auto populated stakeholders for the previous portfolio
function deleteStakeholders(level) {
	var m2mGR = "";
	var stakeHolderList = "";
	
	var gr = new GlideRecord('dmn_stakeholder_register');
	
	if (level == "portfolio")
		{
		if (!previous.portfolio.nil()) {
			gr.addQuery('portfolio', previous.portfolio);
			gs.addInfoMessage("deleted Portfolio: " + previous.portfolio.getDisplayValue());
		}
		else
			return;
	}
	else if (level == "program")
		{
		if (!previous.primary_program.nil()) {
			gr.addQuery('u_program', previous.primary_program);
			gs.addInfoMessage("deleted Program: " + previous.primary_program.getDisplayValue());
		}
		else
			return;
	}
	else if (level == "product")
		{
		if (!previous.u_product.nil()) {
			gr.addQuery('u_product', previous.u_product);
			gs.addInfoMessage("deleted Product: " + previous.u_product.getDisplayValue());
		}
		else
			return;
	}
	
	gr.query();
	
	if (gr.hasNext()) {
		m2mGR = new GlideRecord('dmn_m2m_demand_stakeholder');
		stakeHolderList = "";
		while(gr.next()) {
			stakeHolderList += gr.getUniqueValue();
			gs.addInfoMessage("auto = true " + gr.getDisplayValue('user'));
			stakeHolderList += ",";
		}
		m2mGR.addQuery('stakeholder', 'IN', stakeHolderList);
		m2mGR.addQuery('demand', current.sys_id);
		m2mGR.addQuery('auto', true);
		m2mGR.deleteMultiple();
	}
	
	gr = "";
	gr = new GlideRecord('dmn_stakeholder_register');
	
	if (level == "portfolio")
		gr.addQuery('portfolio', current.portfolio);
	else if (level == "program")
		gr.addQuery('u_program', current.primary_program);
	else if (level == "product")
		gr.addQuery('u_product', current.u_product);
	
	gr.query();
	
	if (gr.hasNext()) {
		m2mGR = "";
		stakeHolderList = "";
		m2mGR = new GlideRecord('dmn_m2m_demand_stakeholder');
		while(gr.next()) {
			stakeHolderList += gr.getUniqueValue();
			gs.addInfoMessage("no auto " + gr.getDisplayValue('user'));
			stakeHolderList += ",";
		}
		m2mGR.addQuery('stakeholder', 'IN', stakeHolderList);
		m2mGR.addQuery('demand', current.sys_id);
		m2mGR.deleteMultiple();
	}
}

function addStakeholders(level) {
	// Add new stakeholders for the current portfolio
	var gr = new GlideRecord('dmn_stakeholder_register');
	
	if (level == "portfolio") {
		gr.addQuery('portfolio', current.portfolio);
		gs.addInfoMessage("added Portfolio: " + current.portfolio.getDisplayValue());
	}
	else if (level == "program") {
		gr.addQuery('u_program', current.primary_program);
		gs.addInfoMessage("added Program: " + current.primary_program.getDisplayValue());
	}
	else if (level == "product") {
		gr.addQuery('u_product', current.u_product);
		gs.addInfoMessage("added Product: " + current.u_product.getDisplayValue());
	}
	
	gr.query();
	while(gr.next()) {
		var m2mGR = new GlideRecord('dmn_m2m_demand_stakeholder');
		m2mGR.initialize();
		m2mGR.demand = current.sys_id;
		gs.addInfoMessage("adding " + gr.getDisplayValue('user'));
		m2mGR.stakeholder = gr.getUniqueValue();
		m2mGR.auto = true;
		m2mGR.insert();
	}
}

deleteStakeholders('portfolio');
deleteStakeholders('program');
deleteStakeholders('product');


if (!previous.portfolio.nil() && current.primary_program.nil() && current.u_product.nil()) 
	addStakeholders('portfolio');
else if (!previous.primary_program.nil() && current.u_product.nil()) {
	addStakeholders('program');
}
else if (!current.primary_program.nil() && current.u_product.nil()) {
	addStakeholders('program');
}
else if (!current.u_product.nil()) 
	addStakeholders('product');
else if (!current.portfolio.nil() && current.primary_program.nil())
		addStakeholders('portfolio');





]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>Michael.Ocasio@hhs.gov</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-09-11 18:29:13</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>e55103e4db64eb006373748e0f9619ae</sys_id><sys_mod_count>109</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Populate Stakeholders based on Portfolio</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_e55103e4db64eb006373748e0f9619ae</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>Michael.Ocasio@hhs.gov</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-09-28 07:02:44</sys_updated_on><template/><when>after</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=e55103e4db64eb006373748e0f9619ae"/></record_update>
