sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_38b24ffcdb51a3006bb976740f96197c
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>dmn_demand</collection><condition>gs.hasRole('demand_manager') && (current.state ==1 || current.state == 2)</condition><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition table="dmn_demand">portfolioVALCHANGES^NQu_productVALCHANGES^NQprimary_programVALCHANGES^EQ<item endquery="false" field="portfolio" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="VALCHANGES" or="false" value=""/><item endquery="false" field="u_product" goto="false" newquery="true" operator="VALCHANGES" or="false" value=""/><item endquery="false" field="primary_program" goto="false" newquery="true" operator="VALCHANGES" or="false" value=""/><item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/></filter_condition><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Populate Demand Stakeholders</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous) {
	
	function deleteDemandStakeholders(stakeholderList, demand, autoAdded) {
		// Delete the list of stakeholders from the demand.
		if (stakeholderList.length > 0) {
			gs.debug(gs.getMessage('Deleting stakeholders {0} from demand {1}', [stakeholderList, demand]));
			var m2mGR;
			m2mGR = new GlideRecord('u_m2m_dmn_direct_stake');
			m2mGR.addQuery('u_expanded_stakeholder_register', 'IN', stakeholderList);
			m2mGR.addQuery('u_demand', demand);
			// If autoAdded is true, add the condition to only delete the stakeholders that were automatically added.
			if (autoAdded) m2mGR.addQuery('auto', true);
			m2mGR.deleteMultiple();
		}
	}

	function deleteImpactedDemandStakeholders(stakeholderList, demand, autoAdded) {
		// Delete the list of impacted stakeholders from the demand.
		if (stakeholderList.length > 0) {
			gs.debug(gs.getMessage('Deleting impacted stakeholders {0} from demand {1}', [stakeholderList, demand]));
			var m2mGR;
			m2mGR = new GlideRecord('u_m2m_dmn_indirect_stake');
			m2mGR.addQuery('u_expanded_stakeholder_register', 'IN', stakeholderList);
			m2mGR.addQuery('u_demand', demand);
			// If autoAdded is true, add the condition to only delete the stakeholders that were automatically added.
			if (autoAdded) m2mGR.addQuery('u_auto_added', true);
			m2mGR.deleteMultiple();
		}
	}
	
	function deletePortfolioStakeholders(current, previous) {
		// Delete all the auto populated stakeholders for the previous portfolio
		var m2mGR, stakeholderList;
		var gr = new GlideRecord('u_expanded_stakeholder_register');
		gr.addQuery('u_portfolio', previous.portfolio);
		gr.addNullQuery('u_program');
		gr.query();
		
		if (gr.hasNext()) {
			stakeholderList = '';
			while(gr.next()) {
				stakeholderList += gr.getUniqueValue();
				stakeholderList += ',';
			}
			deleteDemandStakeholders(stakeholderList, current.sys_id, true);
		}
			
		//Delete any stakeholders associated with the new portfolio, whether auto-populated or not,
		// so they won't be added twice when the Add function is called.
		gr = new GlideRecord('u_expanded_stakeholder_register');
		gr.addQuery('u_portfolio', current.portfolio);
		gr.addNullQuery('u_program');
		gr.query();
		if (gr.hasNext()) {
			stakeholderList = "";
			while(gr.next()) {
				stakeholderList += gr.getUniqueValue();
				stakeholderList += ",";
			}
			deleteDemandStakeholders(stakeholderList, current.sys_id, false);
		}
	}
			
	// Add new stakeholders for the current portfolio
	function addPortfolioStakeholders(current) {
		var gr = new GlideRecord('u_expanded_stakeholder_register');
		gr.addQuery('u_portfolio', current.portfolio);
		gr.addNullQuery('u_program');
		gr.query();
		while(gr.next()) {
			gs.debug(gs.getMessage('Adding portfolio stakeholder {0} to demand {1}', [gr.getDisplayValue(), current.sys_id]));
			var m2mGR = new GlideRecord('u_m2m_dmn_direct_stake');
			m2mGR.initialize();
			m2mGR.u_demand = current.sys_id;
			m2mGR.u_expanded_stakeholder_register = gr.getUniqueValue();
			m2mGR.auto = true;
			m2mGR.insert();
		}
	}
				
	function deleteProgramStakeholders(current, previous) {
		// Delete all the auto populated stakeholders for the previous program
		var m2mGR, stakeholderList;
		var gr = new GlideRecord('u_expanded_stakeholder_register');
		gr.addQuery('u_program', previous.primary_program);
		gr.query();
		
		if (gr.hasNext()) {
			stakeholderList = "";
			while(gr.next()) {
				stakeholderList += gr.getUniqueValue();
				stakeholderList += ",";
			}
			deleteDemandStakeholders(stakeholderList, current.sys_id, true);
		}
						
		// Delete any stakeholders associated with the new program, so they won't be added twice when
		// the Add function is called.
		gr = new GlideRecord('u_expanded_stakeholder_register');
		gr.addQuery('u_program', current.primary_program);
		gr.query();
		if (gr.hasNext()) {
			m2mGR = new GlideRecord('u_m2m_dmn_direct_stake');
			stakeholderList = "";
			while(gr.next()) {
				stakeholderList += gr.getUniqueValue();
				stakeholderList += ",";
			}
			deleteDemandStakeholders(stakeholderList, current.sys_id, false);
		}
	}
						
	// Add new stakeholders for the current program.
	function addProgramStakeholders(current) {
		var gr = new GlideRecord('u_expanded_stakeholder_register');
		gr.addQuery('u_program', current.primary_program);
		gr.query();
		while(gr.next()) {
			gs.debug(gs.getMessage('Adding program stakeholder {0} to demand {1}', [gr.getDisplayValue(), current.sys_id]));
			var m2mGR = new GlideRecord('u_m2m_dmn_direct_stake');
			m2mGR.initialize();
			m2mGR.u_demand = current.sys_id;
			m2mGR.u_expanded_stakeholder_register = gr.getUniqueValue();
			m2mGR.auto = true;
			m2mGR.insert();
		}
	}
	
	function retrieveApplicationModels(parent, startingApplicationModelList, addSelf, exclude) {
		var runningList = '';
		if (startingApplicationModelList.length > 0) {
			runningList = startingApplicationModelList;
		}
		if (addSelf) {
			if (runningList.length > 0) runningList += ',';
			runningList += parent.getUniqueValue();
		}
		var grApplicationModel = new GlideRecord('cmdb_application_product_model');
		var relatedApplicationList = parent.getValue('u_related_applications') || '';
		if (relatedApplicationList.length > 0) {
			var relatedApplications = relatedApplicationList.split(',');
			for (var i=0; i<relatedApplications.length; i++) {
				if (!runningList.includes(relatedApplications[i]) && relatedApplications[i] != exclude) {
					var excludeList = runningList;
					if (excludeList.length > 0) excludeList += ',';
					excludeList += exclude;
					grApplicationModel.addQuery('sys_id', relatedApplications[i])
					.addOrCondition('u_related_applications', 'CONTAINS', relatedApplications[i]);
					grApplicationModel.addQuery('sys_id', 'NOT IN', excludeList);
					grApplicationModel.query();
					while (grApplicationModel.next()) {
						// Recursively retrieve the list of application models from this application model.
						gs.debug(gs.getMessage('Retrieving application models for {0}', grApplicationModel.getDisplayValue()));
						runningList = retrieveApplicationModels(grApplicationModel, runningList, true, exclude);
					}
				}
			}
		} else {
			// Check whether the parent parameter is referenced in the related applications for other models.
			var relatedExcludeList = runningList;
			if (relatedExcludeList.length > 0) relatedExcludeList += ',';
			relatedExcludeList += exclude;
			grApplicationModel.addQuery('u_related_applications', 'CONTAINS', parent.getUniqueValue());
			grApplicationModel.addQuery('sys_id', 'NOT IN', relatedExcludeList);
			grApplicationModel.query();
			while (grApplicationModel.next()) {
				gs.debug(gs.getMessage('Retrieving application models for {0}', grApplicationModel.getDisplayValue()));
				runningList = retrieveApplicationModels(grApplicationModel, runningList, true, exclude);
			}
		}
		gs.debug(gs.getMessage('Application Models list based on {0} expands to {1}', [parent.getDisplayValue(), runningList]));
		return runningList;
	}
 
	function collectProductStakeholders(product, impacted) {
		var grStake = new GlideRecord('u_expanded_stakeholder_register');
		var stakeholderList = '';
		var productList = '';
		
		if (impacted) {
			// Collect the list of related products.
			var grApp = new GlideRecord('cmdb_application_product_model');
			if (grApp.get(product)) {
				//Collect the stakeholders for the list of related products.
				productList = retrieveApplicationModels(grApp,productList,false,grApp.getUniqueValue());
				grStake.addQuery('u_product', 'IN', productList);
				gs.debug(gs.getMessage('Collecting stakeholders for product list {0}', productList));
			} else {
				// Passed product has no related products, so there must not be any other stakeholders to impact.
				return stakeholderList;
			}
		} else {
			//Collect the stakeholders for the passed product.
			grStake.addQuery('u_product', product);
			gs.debug(gs.getMessage('Collecting stakeholders for product {0}', product));
			
		}
		grStake.query();
		while (grStake.next()) {
			stakeholderList += grStake.getUniqueValue() + ',';
		}
		
		return stakeholderList;
	}
							
	function deleteAllProductStakeholders(current, previous) {
		deleteDemandStakeholders(collectProductStakeholders(previous.u_product, false), current.sys_id, true);
									
		deleteDemandStakeholders(collectProductStakeholders(current.u_product, false), current.sys_id, false);
		
		deleteImpactedDemandStakeholders(collectProductStakeholders(previous.u_product, true), current.sys_id, true);
		
		deleteImpactedDemandStakeholders(collectProductStakeholders(current.u_product, true), current.sys_id, false);
	}
	
	//Add impacted stakeholders on the common platform.
	function addImpactedStakeholders(current) {
		//Check for the product in the Application Models table.
		var grApp = new GlideRecord('cmdb_application_product_model');
		var grStake, m2mGR;
		var productList = '';
		grApp.addQuery('sys_id', current.u_product);
		grApp.query();
		if (grApp.hasNext()) {
			grApp.next();
			gs.debug(gs.getMessage('Retrieving application models for {0}', grApp.getDisplayValue()));
			productList = retrieveApplicationModels(grApp,productList,false,grApp.getUniqueValue());
			grStake = new GlideRecord('u_expanded_stakeholder_register');
			grStake.addQuery('u_product', 'IN', productList);
			grStake.query();
			while (grStake.next()) {
				gs.debug(gs.getMessage('Adding impacted product stakeholder {0} to demand {1}', [grStake.getDisplayValue(), current.sys_id]));
				m2mGR = new GlideRecord('u_m2m_dmn_indirect_stake');
				m2mGR.initialize();
				m2mGR.u_demand = current.sys_id;
				m2mGR.u_expanded_stakeholder_register = grStake.getUniqueValue();
				m2mGR.u_auto_added = true;
				m2mGR.insert();
			}
		}
	}
											   
	// Add new stakeholders for the current product and its associated platform product.
	function addProductStakeholders(current) {
		//Add any stakeholders that reference the standalone product.
		grStake = new GlideRecord('u_expanded_stakeholder_register');
		grStake.addQuery('u_product', current.u_product);
		grStake.query();
		while (grStake.next()) {
			gs.debug(gs.getMessage('Adding product stakeholder {0} to demand {1}', [grStake.getDisplayValue(), current.sys_id]));
			m2mGR = new GlideRecord('u_m2m_dmn_direct_stake');
			m2mGR.initialize();
			m2mGR.u_demand = current.sys_id;
			m2mGR.u_expanded_stakeholder_register = grStake.getUniqueValue();
			m2mGR.auto = true;
			m2mGR.insert();
		}
		
		addImpactedStakeholders(current);
	}
											
	if (!previous.primary_program.nil()) {
		// Delete stakeholders associated with the previously selected program.
		gs.debug(gs.getMessage('Deleting program stakeholders'));
		deleteProgramStakeholders(current, previous);
	} else {
		// Delete stakeholders associated with the previously selected portfolio only
		// if there was no previously selected program.
		if (!previous.portfolio.nil()) {
			gs.debug(gs.getMessage('Deleting portfolio stakeholders'));
			deletePortfolioStakeholders(current, previous);
		}
	}
											
	if (!previous.u_product.nil()) {
		gs.debug(gs.getMessage('Deleting product stakeholders'));
		deleteAllProductStakeholders(current, previous);
	}
											
	if (!current.primary_program.nil()) {
		gs.debug(gs.getMessage('Adding program stakeholders.'));
		addProgramStakeholders(current);
	} else {
		// Only add portfolio stakeholders if no program is selected.
		if (!current.portfolio.nil()) {
			gs.debug(gs.getMessage('Adding portfolio stakeholders'));
			addPortfolioStakeholders(current);
		}
	}
										
	if(!current.u_product.nil()) {
		gs.debug(gs.getMessage('Adding product stakeholders for {0}', current.u_product));
		addProductStakeholders(current);
	}
											
})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>Keith.Tucker@hhs.gov</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-10-19 20:00:45</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>38b24ffcdb51a3006bb976740f96197c</sys_id><sys_mod_count>87</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Populate Demand Stakeholders</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_38b24ffcdb51a3006bb976740f96197c</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>Keith.Tucker@hhs.gov</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-11-15 13:18:06</sys_updated_on><template/><when>after</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=38b24ffcdb51a3006bb976740f96197c"/></record_update>

19:39:391fc04221db7563006373748e0f9619ea0Keith.Tucker@hhs.gov2018-11-15 19:39:39// Set the variable 'answer' to a comma-separated list of group ids or an array of group ids to add as approvers. // // For example: // var answer = []; // answer.push('id1'); // answer.push('id2'); var answer = []; function impacted(demand, grStakeholder, metric) { var approvalNeeded = false; var grGroupMember = new GlideRecord('sys_user_grmember'); grGroupMember.addQuery('group', grStakeholder.getValue('u_group')); grGroupMember.query(); while (grGroupMember.next()) { // Find the assessment instance for the assessor on the passed demand. // Make sure to retrieve the specific instance for the assessment stakeholder stored in related_id_1. var grAssessmentInstance = new GlideRecord('asmt_assessment_instance'); grAssessmentInstance.addQuery('trigger_id', demand) .addCondition('related_id_1', grStakeholder.getUniqueValue()) .addCondition('user', grGroupMember.getValue('user')); grAssessmentInstance.setLimit(1); grAssessmentInstance.query(); if (grAssessmentInstance.next()) { // Look for an impact assessment result for the assessment instance. var grMetricResult = new GlideRecord('asmt_metric_result'); grMetricResult.addQuery('instance', grAssessmentInstance.getUniqueValue()) .addCondition('metric', metric); grMetricResult.setLimit(1); grMetricResult.query(); if (grMetricResult.next()) { if ((grMetricResult.getValue('actual_value') || '') == '1') { approvalNeeded = true; break; } } } } return approvalNeeded; } //Retrieve the list of approval stakeholders for the demand. var grApprovers = new GlideRecord('u_m2m_dmn_direct_stake'); grApprovers.addQuery("u_demand", current.sys_id); grApprovers.query(); if (grApprovers.hasNext()) { while (grApprovers.next()) { var grStake = new GlideRecord('u_expanded_stakeholder_register'); grStake.get(grApprovers.getValue('u_expanded_stakeholder_register')); if (grStake.getValue('u_approver') == 'yes') { //Add the group to the approval group array. answer.push(grStake.getValue('u_group')); } } } // Loop over the list of impacted stakeholders for the demand. var impactedStakeholders = {}; var grImpactedStakeholders = new GlideRecord('u_m2m_dmn_indirect_stake'); grImpactedStakeholders.addQuery('u_demand', current.sys_id); grImpactedStakeholders.query(); if (grImpactedStakeholders.hasNext()) { // Retrieve the record for the Impacts metric, to use in later queries. var grMetric = new GlideRecord('asmt_metric'); var encodedQuery = 'name=Impacts^category.name=Impact^category.metric_type.name=Multi-tenant Demand'; grMetric.addEncodedQuery(encodedQuery); grMetric.setLimit(1); grMetric.query(); if (grMetric.next()) { while (grImpactedStakeholders.next()) { //Create an array of groups to create, one for each //Portfolio/Program/Product combination. var grStake = new GlideRecord('u_expanded_stakeholder_register'); grStake.get(grImpactedStakeholders.getValue('u_expanded_stakeholder_register')); var portfolio = grStake.getValue('u_portfolio') || ''; var program = grStake.getValue('u_program') || ''; var product = grStake.getValue('u_product') || ''; var groupKey = portfolio + '/' + program + '/' + product; var approver = grStake.getValue('u_approver') == 'yes'; var assessor = grStake.getValue('u_assessment') == 'yes'; if (impactedStakeholders.hasOwnProperty(groupKey)) { workflow.debug(gs.getMessage('Updating stakeholder group {0}', groupKey)); // If this stakeholder is an approver, add it to the approvers array. if (approver) { workflow.debug(gs.getMessage('Adding approval group {0}', grStake.getValue('u_group'))); impactedStakeholders[groupKey].approvers .push(grStake.getValue('u_group')); } if (assessor) { // Check the assessment result for this stakeholder, and OR it with // any previous assessments to determine whether an approval is // needed from this group. impactedStakeholders[groupKey].approvalNeeded |= impacted(current.sys_id, grStake, grMetric.getUniqueValue()); } } else { workflow.debug(gs.getMessage('Adding stakeholder group {0}', groupKey)); // Initialize the fields for the group. impactedStakeholders[groupKey] = {}; if (approver) { workflow.debug(gs.getMessage('Adding approval group {0}', grStake.getValue('u_group'))); impactedStakeholders[groupKey].approvers = [grStake.getValue('u_group')]; } else { impactedStakeholders[groupKey].approvers = []; } if (assessor) { impactedStakeholders[groupKey].approvalNeeded = impacted(current.sys_id, grStake, grMetric.getUniqueValue()); } else { impactedStakeholders[groupKey].approvalNeeded = false; } } // End if groupKey exists in impactedStakeholders object } // End loop over impacted stakeholders } else { workflow.debug(gs.getMessage('Impact metric not found.')); }// End if metric found } // End if impacted stakeholders found if (Object.keys(impactedStakeholders).length > 0) { for (var g in impactedStakeholders) { workflow.debug(gs.getMessage('Checking approval need for {0}', [g])); if (impactedStakeholders[g].approvalNeeded) { //Add the groups for the group key to the array for which approvals will be requested. for (var i=0; i<impactedStakeholders[g].approvers.length; i++) { workflow.debug(gs.getMessage('Adding approval group {0}', [impactedStakeholders[g].approvers[i]])); answer.push(impactedStakeholders[g].approvers[i]); } } } } 19:39:39// Set 'answer' to the number of seconds this timer should wait answer = 0;fe9533e6db61a3406373748e0f961922wf_activity93c04eeddb3563006373748e0f96194a1370sys_variable_valueKeith.Tucker@hhs.gov2018-11-15 19:39:3957c04221db7563006373748e0f9619e80Keith.Tucker@hhs.gov2018-11-15 19:39:39// Set the variable 'answer' to '', 'approved' or 'rejected' to indicate the overall approval status for this approval. // // This script is responsible for setting the approval state for each group that is part of this approval activity before // returning the overall approval state for all of the group(s). // // When called, the following variables are available to the script: // // Overall for all of the groups that are part of this approval activity: // counts.total = total number of groups that are part of this approval // counts.approved = # of groups that approved so far // counts.rejected = # of groups that rejected so far // counts.requested = # of groups that are pending approval // counts.not_requested = # of groups that are not pending approval // counts.not_required = # of groups that approval is not required // // And for each group: // groups[group_id].total = total number of users that are part of this group's approval // groups[group_id].approved = # of users that approved so far // groups[group_id].rejected = # of users that rejected so far // groups[group_id].requested = # of users that are pending approval // groups[group_id].not_requested = # of users that are not pending approval // groups[group_id].not_required = # of users that approval is not required // // groups[group_id].approvalIDs[state] = array of user ids that are at the specified approval state // // Note: Iterate the groups using: // for (var id in groups) { // var group = groups[id]; // ... group.total ... // } // Assume all approvals aren't finished yet. var answer = ''; for(var id in groups) { var group = groups[id]; var groupApproval = new GlideRecord('sysapproval_group'); groupApproval.get(id); // Skip this group if it's already been decided. var approvalState = groupApproval.getValue('approval') || ''; if ((approvalState != 'approved') && (approvalState != 'rejected')) { // Set the group approval if any answer has been received. if(group.approved > 0) { //Mark the group approval record 'Approved' groupApproval.approval = 'approved'; counts.approved++; groupApproval.update(); } else if (group.rejected > 0) { groupApproval.approval = 'rejected'; counts.rejected++; groupApproval.update(); } } } // If all groups have rendered a decision, return the overall status for the approval task. // Otherwise, leave the overall status as empty so the group approval task will remain active. // Set it to 'approved' only if all groups approved. if(counts.approved == counts.total){ answer = 'approved'; } else if (counts.rejected == counts.total) { answer = 'rejected'; } else if ((counts.approved + counts.rejected) == counts.total) { answer = 0;fe9533e6db61a3406373748e0f961922wf_activity93c04eeddb3563006373748e0f96194a1370sys_variable_valueKeith.Tucker@hhs.gov2018-11-15 19:39:3957c04221db7563006373748e0f9619e80Keith.Tucker@hhs.gov2018-11-15 19:39:39// Set the variable 'answer' to '', 'approved' or 'rejected' to indicate the overall approval status for this approval. // // This script is responsible for setting the approval state for each group that is part of this approval activity before // returning the overall approval state for all of the group(s). // // When called, the following variables are available to the script: // // Overall for all of the groups that are part of this approval activity: // counts.total = total number of groups that are part of this approval // counts.approved = # of groups that approved so far // counts.rejected = # of groups that rejected so far // counts.requested = # of groups that are pending approval // counts.not_requested = # of groups that are not pending approval // counts.not_required = # of groups that approval is not required // // And for each group: // groups[group_id].total = total number of users that are part of this group's approval // groups[group_id].approved = # of users that approved so far // groups[group_id].rejected = # of users that rejected so far // groups[group_id].requested = # of users that are pending approval // groups[group_id].not_requested = # of users that are not pending approval // groups[group_id].not_required = # of users that approval is not required // // groups[group_id].approvalIDs[state] = array of user ids that are at the specified approval state // // Note: Iterate the groups using: // for (var id in groups) { // var group = groups[id]; // ... group.total ... // } // Assume all approvals aren't finished yet. var answer = ''; for(var id in groups) { var group = groups[id]; var groupApproval = new GlideRecord('sysapproval_group'); groupApproval.get(id); // Skip this group if it's already been decided. var approvalState = groupApproval.getValue('approval') || ''; if ((approvalState != 'approved') && (approvalState != 'rejected')) { // Set the group approval if any answer has been received. if(group.approved > 0) { //Mark the group approval record 'Approved' groupApproval.approval = 'approved'; counts.approved++; groupApproval.update(); } else if (group.rejected > 0) { groupApproval.approval = 'rejected'; counts.rejected++; groupApproval.update(); } } } // If all groups have rendered a decision, return the overall status for the approval task. // Otherwise, leave the overall status as empty so the group approval task will remain active. // Set it to 'approved' only if all groups approved. if(counts.approved == counts.total){ answer = 'approved'; } else if (counts.rejected == counts.total) { answer = 'rejected'; } else if ((counts.approved + counts.rejected) == counts.total) { answer = 'conflicted'; } aa95ffa6db61a3406373748e0f9619c8wf_activity93c04eeddb3563006373748e0f96194a2000sys_variable_valueKeith.Tucker@hhs.gov2018-11-15 19:39:391e295ffa6db61a3406373748e0f9619afwf_activity93c04eeddb3563006373748e0f96194a2050sys_variable_valueKeith.Tucker@hhs.gov2018-11-15 19:39:391fc04221db7563006373748e0f9619ea0Keith.Tucker@hhs.gov2018-11-15 19:39:39// Set the variable 'answer' to a comma-separated list of group ids or an array of group ids to add as approvers. // // For example: // var answer = []; // answer.push('id1'); // answer.push('id2'); var answer = []; function impacted(demand, grStakeholder, metric) { var approvalNeeded = false; var grGroupMember = new GlideRecord('sys_user_grmember'); grGroupMember.addQuery('group', grStakeholder.getValue('u_group')); grGroupMember.query(); while (grGroupMember.next()) { // Find the assessment instance for the assessor on the passed demand. // Make sure to retrieve the specific instance for the assessment stakeholder stored in related_id_1. var grAssessmentInstance = new GlideRecord('asmt_assessment_instance'); grAssessmentInstance.addQuery('trigger_id', demand) .addCondition('related_id_1', grStakeholder.getUniqueValue()) .addCondition('user', grGroupMember.getValue('user')); grAssessmentInstance.setLimit(1); grAssessmentInstance.query(); if (grAssessmentInstance.next()) { // Look for an impact assessment result for the assessment instance. var grMetricResult = new GlideRecord('asmt_metric_result'); grMetricResult.addQuery('instance', grAssessmentInstance.getUniqueValue()) .addCondition('metric', metric); grMetricResult.setLimit(1); grMetricResult.query(); if (grMetricResult.next()) { if ((grMetricResult.getValue('actual_value') || '') == '1') { approvalNeeded = true; break; } } } } return approvalNeeded; } //Retrieve the list of approval stakeholders for the demand. var grApprovers = new GlideRecord('u_m2m_dmn_direct_stake'); grApprovers.addQuery("u_demand", current.sys_id); grApprovers.query(); if (grApprovers.hasNext()) { while (grApprovers.next()) { var grStake = new GlideRecord('u_expanded_stakeholder_register'); grStake.get(grApprovers.getValue('u_expanded_stakeholder_register')); if (grStake.getValue('u_approver') == 'yes') { //Add the group to the approval group array. answer.push(grStake.getValue('u_group')); } } } // Loop over the list of impacted stakeholders for the demand. var impactedStakeholders = {}; var grImpactedStakeholders = new GlideRecord('u_m2m_dmn_indirect_stake'); grImpactedStakeholders.addQuery('u_demand', current.sys_id); grImpactedStakeholders.query(); if (grImpactedStakeholders.hasNext()) { // Retrieve the record for the Impacts metric, to use in later queries. var grMetric = new GlideRecord('asmt_metric'); var encodedQuery = 'name=Impacts^category.name=Impact^category.metric_type.name=Multi-tenant Demand'; grMetric.addEncodedQuery(encodedQuery); grMetric.setLimit(1); grMetric.query(); if (grMetric.next()) { while (grImpactedStakeholders.next()) { //Create an array of groups to create, one for each //Portfolio/Program/Product combination. var grStake = new GlideRecord('u_expanded_stakeholder_register'); grStake.get(grImpactedStakeholders.getValue('u_expanded_stakeholder_register')); var portfolio = grStake.getValue('u_portfolio') || ''; var program = grStake.getValue('u_program') || ''; var product = grStake.getValue('u_product') || ''; var groupKey = portfolio + '/' + program + '/' + product; var approver = grStake.getValue('u_approver') == 'yes'; var assessor = grStake.getValue('u_assessment') == 'yes'; if (impactedStakeholders.hasOwnProperty(groupKey)) { workflow.debug(gs.getMessage('Updating stakeholder group {0}', groupKey)); // If this stakeholder is an approver, add it to the approvers array. if (approver) { workflow.debug(gs.getMessage('Adding approval group {0}', grStake.getValue('u_group'))); impactedStakeholders[groupKey].approvers .push(grStake.getValue('u_group')); } if (assessor) { // Check the assessment result for this stakeholder, and OR it with // any previous assessments to determine whether an approval is // needed from this group. impactedStakeholders[groupKey].approvalNeeded |= impacted(current.sys_id, grStake, grMetric.getUniqueValue()); } } else { workflow.debug(gs.getMessage('Adding stakeholder group {0}', groupKey)); // Initialize the fields for the group. impactedStakeholders[groupKey] = {}; if (approver) { workflow.debug(gs.getMessage('Adding approval group {0}', grStake.getValue('u_group'))); impactedStakeholders[groupKey].approvers = [grStake.getValue('u_group')]; } else { impactedStakeholders[groupKey].approvers = []; } if (assessor) { impactedStakeholders[groupKey].approvalNeeded = impacted(current.sys_id, grStake, grMetric.getUniqueValue()); } else { impactedStakeholders[groupKey].approvalNeeded = false; } } // End if groupKey exists in impactedStakeholders object } // End loop over impacted stakeholders } else { workflow.debug(gs.getMessage('Impact metric not found.')); }// End if metric found } // End if impacted stakeholders found if (Object.keys(impactedStakeholders).length > 0) { for (var g in impactedStakeholders) { workflow.debug(gs.getMessage('Checking approval need for {0}', [g])); if (impactedStakeholders[g].approvalNeeded) { //Add the groups for the group key to the array for which approvals will be requested. for (var i=0; i<impactedStakeholders[g].approvers.length; i++) { workflow.debug(gs.getMessage('Adding approval group {0}', [impactedStakeholders[g].approvers[i]])); answer.push(impactedStakeholders[g].approvers[i]); } } } } 6e95ffa6db61a3406373748e0f9619bb93c04eeddb3563006373748e0f96194aactivity.result ==
